63 INSTANTIATE_SINGLETON_1(ObjectMgr);
64 
65 bool normalizePlayerName(std::string& name, size_t max_len)
66 {
67  if (name.empty())
68  return false;
69 
70  std::wstring wstr_buf;
71  if (!Utf8toWStr(name, wstr_buf))
72  return false;
73 
74  size_t len = wstr_buf.size();
75  if (len > max_len)
76  return false;
77 
78  wstr_buf[0] = wcharToUpper(wstr_buf[0]);
79  for (size_t i = 1; i < len; ++i)
80  wstr_buf[i] = wcharToLower(wstr_buf[i]);
81 
82  return WStrToUtf8(wstr_buf, name);
83 }
84 
85 LanguageDesc lang_description[LANGUAGES_COUNT] =
86 {
87  { LANG_ADDON, 0, 0 },
88  { LANG_UNIVERSAL, 0, 0 },
89  { LANG_ORCISH, 669, SKILL_LANG_ORCISH },
90  { LANG_DARNASSIAN, 671, SKILL_LANG_DARNASSIAN },
91  { LANG_TAURAHE, 670, SKILL_LANG_TAURAHE },
92  { LANG_DWARVISH, 672, SKILL_LANG_DWARVEN },
93  { LANG_COMMON, 668, SKILL_LANG_COMMON },
94  { LANG_DEMONIC, 815, SKILL_LANG_DEMON_TONGUE },
95  { LANG_TITAN, 816, SKILL_LANG_TITAN },
96  { LANG_THALASSIAN, 813, SKILL_LANG_THALASSIAN },
97  { LANG_DRACONIC, 814, SKILL_LANG_DRACONIC },
98  { LANG_KALIMAG, 817, SKILL_LANG_OLD_TONGUE },
99  { LANG_GNOMISH, 7340, SKILL_LANG_GNOMISH },
100  { LANG_TROLL, 7341, SKILL_LANG_TROLL },
101  { LANG_GUTTERSPEAK, 17737, SKILL_LANG_GUTTERSPEAK },
102  { LANG_DRAENEI, 29932, SKILL_LANG_DRAENEI },
103  { LANG_ZOMBIE, 0, 0 },
104  { LANG_GNOMISH_BINARY, 0, 0 },
105  { LANG_GOBLIN_BINARY, 0, 0 }
106 };
107 
108 LanguageDesc const* GetLanguageDescByID(uint32 lang)
109 {
110  for (auto& i : lang_description)
111  {
112  if (uint32(i.lang_id) == lang)
113  return &i;
114  }
115 
116  return nullptr;
117 }
118 
119 bool SpellClickInfo::IsFitToRequirements(Player const* player, Creature const* clickedCreature) const
120 {
121  if (conditionId)
122  return sObjectMgr.IsConditionSatisfied(conditionId, player, player->GetMap(), clickedCreature, CONDITION_FROM_SPELLCLICK);
123 
124  if (questStart)
125  {
126  // not in expected required quest state
127  if (!player || ((!questStartCanActive || !player->IsActiveQuest(questStart)) && !player->GetQuestRewardStatus(questStart)))
128  return false;
129  }
130 
131  if (questEnd)
132  {
133  // not in expected forbidden quest state
134  if (!player || player->GetQuestRewardStatus(questEnd))
135  return false;
136  }
137 
138  return true;
139 }
140 
141 template<typename T>
142 T IdGenerator<T>::Generate()
143 {
144  if (m_nextGuid >= std::numeric_limits<T>::max() - 1)
145  {
146  sLog.outError("%s guid overflow!! Can't continue, shutting down server. ", m_name);
147  World::StopNow(ERROR_EXIT_CODE);
148  }
149  return m_nextGuid++;
150 }
151 
152 template uint32 IdGenerator<uint32>::Generate();
153 template uint64 IdGenerator<uint64>::Generate();
154 
155 ObjectMgr::ObjectMgr() :
156  m_Dbc2StorageLocaleIndex(DEFAULT_LOCALE),
157  m_ArenaTeamIds("Arena team ids"),
158  m_AuctionIds("Auction ids"),
159  m_EquipmentSetIds("Equipment set ids"),
160  m_GuildIds("Guild ids"),
161  m_MailIds("Mail ids"),
162  m_PetNumbers("Pet numbers"),
163  m_FirstTemporaryCreatureGuid(1),
164  m_FirstTemporaryGameObjectGuid(1),
165  m_unitConditionMgr(std::make_unique<UnitConditionMgr>()),
166  m_worldStateExpressionMgr(std::make_unique<WorldStateExpressionMgr>()),
167  m_combatConditionMgr(std::make_unique<CombatConditionMgr>(*m_unitConditionMgr, *m_worldStateExpressionMgr))
168 {
169 }
170 
171 ObjectMgr::~ObjectMgr()
172 {
173  for (auto& mQuestTemplate : mQuestTemplates)
174  delete mQuestTemplate.second;
175 
176  for (auto& i : petInfo)
177  delete[] i.second;
178 
179  // free only if loaded
180  for (auto& class_ : playerClassInfo)
181  delete[] class_.levelInfo;
182 
183  for (auto& race : playerInfo)
184  for (int class_ = 0; class_ < MAX_CLASSES; ++class_)
185  delete[] race[class_].levelInfo;
186 
187  // free objects
188  for (auto& itr : mGroupMap)
189  delete itr.second;
190 
191  for (auto& itr : mArenaTeamMap)
192  delete itr.second;
193 
194  for (auto& itr : m_mCacheVendorTemplateItemMap)
195  itr.second.Clear();
196 
197  for (auto& itr : m_mCacheVendorItemMap)
198  itr.second.Clear();
199 
200  for (auto& itr : m_mCacheTrainerSpellMap)
201  itr.second.Clear();
202 }
203 
204 Group* ObjectMgr::GetGroupById(uint32 id) const
205 {
206  GroupMap::const_iterator itr = mGroupMap.find(id);
207  if (itr != mGroupMap.end())
208  return itr->second;
209 
210  return nullptr;
211 }
212 
213 ArenaTeam* ObjectMgr::GetArenaTeamById(uint32 arenateamid) const
214 {
215  ArenaTeamMap::const_iterator itr = mArenaTeamMap.find(arenateamid);
216  if (itr != mArenaTeamMap.end())
217  return itr->second;
218 
219  return nullptr;
220 }
221 
222 ArenaTeam* ObjectMgr::GetArenaTeamByName(const std::string& arenateamname) const
223 {
224  for (const auto& itr : mArenaTeamMap)
225  if (itr.second->GetName() == arenateamname)
226  return itr.second;
227 
228  return nullptr;
229 }
230 
231 ArenaTeam* ObjectMgr::GetArenaTeamByCaptain(ObjectGuid guid) const
232 {
233  for (const auto& itr : mArenaTeamMap)
234  if (itr.second->GetCaptainGuid() == guid)
235  return itr.second;
236 
237  return nullptr;
238 }
239 
240 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureLocales()
241 {
242  mCreatureLocaleMap.clear(); // need for reload case
243 
244  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT entry,name_loc1,subname_loc1,name_loc2,subname_loc2,name_loc3,subname_loc3,name_loc4,subname_loc4,name_loc5,subname_loc5,name_loc6,subname_loc6,name_loc7,subname_loc7,name_loc8,subname_loc8 FROM locales_creature");
245 
246  if (!result)
247  {
248  BarGoLink bar(1);
249  bar.step();
250  sLog.outString(">> Loaded 0 creature locale strings. DB table `locales_creature` is empty.");
251  return;
252  }
253 
254  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
255 
256  do
257  {
258  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
259  bar.step();
260 
261  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
262 
263  if (!GetCreatureTemplate(entry))
264  {
265  ERROR_DB_STRICT_LOG("Table `locales_creature` has data for not existed creature entry %u, skipped.", entry);
266  continue;
267  }
268 
269  CreatureLocale& data = mCreatureLocaleMap[entry];
270 
271  for (int i = 1; i < MAX_LOCALE; ++i)
272  {
273  std::string str = fields[1 + 2 * (i - 1)].GetCppString();
274  if (!str.empty())
275  {
276  int idx = GetOrNewStorageLocaleIndexFor(LocaleConstant(i));
277  if (idx >= 0)
278  {
279  if ((int32)data.Name.size() <= idx)
280  data.Name.resize(idx + 1);
281 
282  data.Name[idx] = str;
283  }
284  }
285  str = fields[1 + 2 * (i - 1) + 1].GetCppString();
286  if (!str.empty())
287  {
288  int idx = GetOrNewStorageLocaleIndexFor(LocaleConstant(i));
289  if (idx >= 0)
290  {
291  if ((int32)data.SubName.size() <= idx)
292  data.SubName.resize(idx + 1);
293 
294  data.SubName[idx] = str;
295  }
296  }
297  }
298  }
299  while (result->NextRow());
300 
301  delete result;
302 
303  sLog.outString(">> Loaded " SIZEFMTD " creature locale strings", mCreatureLocaleMap.size());
304  sLog.outString();
305 }
306 
307 void ObjectMgr::LoadGossipMenuItemsLocales()
308 {
309  mGossipMenuItemsLocaleMap.clear(); // need for reload case
310 
311  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT menu_id,id,"
312  "option_text_loc1,box_text_loc1,option_text_loc2,box_text_loc2,"
313  "option_text_loc3,box_text_loc3,option_text_loc4,box_text_loc4,"
314  "option_text_loc5,box_text_loc5,option_text_loc6,box_text_loc6,"
315  "option_text_loc7,box_text_loc7,option_text_loc8,box_text_loc8 "
316  "FROM locales_gossip_menu_option");
317 
318  if (!result)
319  {
320  BarGoLink bar(1);
321  bar.step();
322  sLog.outString(">> Loaded 0 gossip_menu_option locale strings. DB table `locales_gossip_menu_option` is empty.");
323  return;
324  }
325 
326  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
327 
328  do
329  {
330  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
331  bar.step();
332 
333  uint16 menuId = fields[0].GetUInt16();
334  uint16 id = fields[1].GetUInt16();
335 
336  GossipMenuItemsMapBounds bounds = GetGossipMenuItemsMapBounds(menuId);
337 
338  bool found = false;
339  if (bounds.first != bounds.second)
340  {
341  for (GossipMenuItemsMap::const_iterator itr = bounds.first; itr != bounds.second; ++itr)
342  {
343  if (itr->second.id == id)
344  {
345  found = true;
346  break;
347  }
348  }
349  }
350 
351  if (!found)
352  {
353  ERROR_DB_STRICT_LOG("Table `locales_gossip_menu_option` has data for nonexistent gossip menu %u item %u, skipped.", menuId, id);
354  continue;
355  }
356 
357  GossipMenuItemsLocale& data = mGossipMenuItemsLocaleMap[MAKE_PAIR32(menuId, id)];
358 
359  for (int i = 1; i < MAX_LOCALE; ++i)
360  {
361  std::string str = fields[2 + 2 * (i - 1)].GetCppString();
362  if (!str.empty())
363  {
364  int idx = GetOrNewStorageLocaleIndexFor(LocaleConstant(i));
365  if (idx >= 0)
366  {
367  if ((int32)data.OptionText.size() <= idx)
368  data.OptionText.resize(idx + 1);
369 
370  data.OptionText[idx] = str;
371  }
372  }
373  str = fields[2 + 2 * (i - 1) + 1].GetCppString();
374  if (!str.empty())
375  {
376  int idx = GetOrNewStorageLocaleIndexFor(LocaleConstant(i));
377  if (idx >= 0)
378  {
379  if ((int32)data.BoxText.size() <= idx)
380  data.BoxText.resize(idx + 1);
381 
382  data.BoxText[idx] = str;
383  }
384  }
385  }
386  }
387  while (result->NextRow());
388 
389  delete result;
390 
391  sLog.outString(">> Loaded " SIZEFMTD " gossip_menu_option locale strings", mGossipMenuItemsLocaleMap.size());
392  sLog.outString();
393 }
394 
395 void ObjectMgr::LoadPointOfInterestLocales()
396 {
397  mPointOfInterestLocaleMap.clear(); // need for reload case
398 
399  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT entry,icon_name_loc1,icon_name_loc2,icon_name_loc3,icon_name_loc4,icon_name_loc5,icon_name_loc6,icon_name_loc7,icon_name_loc8 FROM locales_points_of_interest");
400 
401  if (!result)
402  {
403  BarGoLink bar(1);
404  bar.step();
405  sLog.outString(">> Loaded 0 points_of_interest locale strings. DB table `locales_points_of_interest` is empty.");
406  return;
407  }
408 
409  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
410 
411  do
412  {
413  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
414  bar.step();
415 
416  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
417 
418  if (!GetPointOfInterest(entry))
419  {
420  ERROR_DB_STRICT_LOG("Table `locales_points_of_interest` has data for nonexistent POI entry %u, skipped.", entry);
421  continue;
422  }
423 
424  PointOfInterestLocale& data = mPointOfInterestLocaleMap[entry];
425 
426  for (int i = 1; i < MAX_LOCALE; ++i)
427  {
428  std::string str = fields[i].GetCppString();
429  if (str.empty())
430  continue;
431 
432  int idx = GetOrNewStorageLocaleIndexFor(LocaleConstant(i));
433  if (idx >= 0)
434  {
435  if ((int32)data.IconName.size() <= idx)
436  data.IconName.resize(idx + 1);
437 
438  data.IconName[idx] = str;
439  }
440  }
441  }
442  while (result->NextRow());
443 
444  delete result;
445 
446  sLog.outString(">> Loaded " SIZEFMTD " points_of_interest locale strings", mPointOfInterestLocaleMap.size());
447  sLog.outString();
448 }
449 
450 struct SQLCreatureLoader : public SQLStorageLoaderBase<SQLCreatureLoader, SQLStorage>
451 {
452  template<class D>
453  void convert_from_str(uint32 /*field_pos*/, char const* src, D& dst)
454  {
455  dst = D(sScriptDevAIMgr.GetScriptId(src));
456  }
457 };
458 
459 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureTemplates()
460 {
461  SQLCreatureLoader loader;
462  loader.Load(sCreatureStorage);
463 
464  std::set<uint32> difficultyEntries[MAX_DIFFICULTY - 1]; // already loaded difficulty 1 value in creatures
465  std::set<uint32> hasDifficultyEntries[MAX_DIFFICULTY - 1]; // already loaded creatures with difficulty 1 values
466 
467  // check data correctness
468  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
469  {
470  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(i);
471  if (!cInfo)
472  continue;
473 
474  bool ok = true; // bool to allow continue outside this loop
475  for (uint32 diff = 0; diff < MAX_DIFFICULTY - 1 && ok; ++diff)
476  {
477  if (!cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff])
478  continue;
479  ok = false; // will be set to true at the end of this loop again
480 
481  CreatureInfo const* difficultyInfo = GetCreatureTemplate(cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
482  if (!difficultyInfo)
483  {
484  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) have `DifficultyEntry%u`=%u but creature entry %u not exist.",
485  i, diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff], cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
486  continue;
487  }
488 
489  if (difficultyEntries[diff].find(i) != difficultyEntries[diff].end())
490  {
491  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) listed as difficulty %u but have value in `DifficultyEntry%u`.", i, diff + 1, diff + 1);
492  continue;
493  }
494 
495  bool ok2 = true;
496  for (uint32 diff2 = 0; diff2 < MAX_DIFFICULTY - 1 && ok2; ++diff2)
497  {
498  ok2 = false;
499  if (difficultyEntries[diff2].find(cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]) != difficultyEntries[diff2].end())
500  {
501  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) already listed as difficulty %u for another entry.", cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff], diff2 + 1);
502  continue;
503  }
504 
505  if (hasDifficultyEntries[diff2].find(cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]) != hasDifficultyEntries[diff2].end())
506  {
507  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) have `DifficultyEntry%u`=%u but creature entry %u have difficulty %u entry also.",
508  i, diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff], cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff], diff2 + 1);
509  continue;
510  }
511  ok2 = true;
512  }
513  if (!ok2)
514  continue;
515 
516  if (cInfo->UnitClass != difficultyInfo->UnitClass)
517  {
518  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u, class %u) has different `UnitClass` in difficulty %u mode (Entry: %u, class %u).",
519  i, cInfo->UnitClass, diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff], difficultyInfo->UnitClass);
520  continue;
521  }
522 
523  if (cInfo->NpcFlags != difficultyInfo->NpcFlags)
524  {
525  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has different `NpcFlags` in difficulty %u mode (Entry: %u).", i, diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
526  continue;
527  }
528 
529  if (cInfo->TrainerClass != difficultyInfo->TrainerClass)
530  {
531  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has different `TrainerClass` in difficulty %u mode (Entry: %u).", i, diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
532  continue;
533  }
534 
535  if (cInfo->TrainerRace != difficultyInfo->TrainerRace)
536  {
537  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has different `TrainerRace` in difficulty %u mode (Entry: %u).", i, diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
538  continue;
539  }
540 
541  if (cInfo->TrainerType != difficultyInfo->TrainerType)
542  {
543  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has different `TrainerType` in difficulty %u mode (Entry: %u).", i, diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
544  continue;
545  }
546 
547  if (cInfo->TrainerSpell != difficultyInfo->TrainerSpell)
548  {
549  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has different `TrainerSpell` in difficulty %u mode (Entry: %u).", i, diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
550  continue;
551  }
552 
553  if (difficultyInfo->AIName && *difficultyInfo->AIName)
554  {
555  sLog.outErrorDb("Difficulty %u mode creature (Entry: %u) has `AIName`, but in any case will used difficulty 0 mode creature (Entry: %u) AIName.",
556  diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff], i);
557  continue;
558  }
559 
560  if (difficultyInfo->ScriptID)
561  {
562  sLog.outErrorDb("Difficulty %u mode creature (Entry: %u) has `ScriptName`, but in any case will used difficulty 0 mode creature (Entry: %u) ScriptName.",
563  diff + 1, cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff], i);
564  continue;
565  }
566 
567  hasDifficultyEntries[diff].insert(i);
568  difficultyEntries[diff].insert(cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
569  ok = true;
570  }
571  if (!ok)
572  continue;
573 
574  FactionTemplateEntry const* factionTemplate = sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->Faction);
575  if (!factionTemplate)
576  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has nonexistent Faction template (%u)", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->Faction);
577 
578  for (int k = 0; k < MAX_KILL_CREDIT; ++k)
579  {
580  if (cInfo->KillCredit[k])
581  {
582  if (!GetCreatureTemplate(cInfo->KillCredit[k]))
583  {
584  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has nonexistent creature entry in `KillCredit%d` (%u)", cInfo->Entry, k + 1, cInfo->KillCredit[k]);
585  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->KillCredit[k] = 0;
586  }
587  }
588  }
589 
590  // used later for scale
591  CreatureDisplayInfoEntry const* displayScaleEntry = nullptr;
592 
593  for (int j = 0; j < MAX_CREATURE_MODEL; ++j)
594  {
595  if (cInfo->ModelId[j])
596  {
597  CreatureDisplayInfoEntry const* displayEntry = sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->ModelId[j]);
598  if (!displayEntry)
599  {
600  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has nonexistent `ModelId%d` (%u), can crash client", cInfo->Entry, j + 1, cInfo->ModelId[j]);
601  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->ModelId[j] = 0;
602  }
603  else if (!displayScaleEntry)
604  displayScaleEntry = displayEntry;
605 
606  CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sCreatureModelStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureModelInfo>(cInfo->ModelId[j]);
607  if (!minfo)
608  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) are using `ModelId%d` (%u), but creature_model_info are missing for this model.", cInfo->Entry, j + 1, cInfo->ModelId[j]);
609  }
610  }
611 
612  if (!displayScaleEntry)
613  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has nonexistent modelid in `ModelId1`/`ModelId2`/ModelId3`/`ModelId4`", cInfo->Entry);
614 
615  if (!cInfo->MinLevel)
616  {
617  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has invalid `MinLevel`, set to 1", cInfo->Entry);
618  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->MinLevel = 1;
619  }
620 
621  if (cInfo->MinLevel > cInfo->MaxLevel)
622  {
623  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has invalid `MaxLevel`, using `MinLevel` value instead", cInfo->Entry);
624  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->MaxLevel = cInfo->MinLevel;
625  }
626 
627  if (cInfo->MinLevel > DEFAULT_MAX_CREATURE_LEVEL)
628  {
629  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) `MinLevel` exceeds maximum allowed value of '%u'", cInfo->Entry, uint32(DEFAULT_MAX_CREATURE_LEVEL));
630  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->MinLevel = uint32(DEFAULT_MAX_CREATURE_LEVEL);
631  }
632 
633  if (cInfo->MaxLevel > DEFAULT_MAX_CREATURE_LEVEL)
634  {
635  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) `MaxLevel` exceeds maximum allowed value of '%u'", cInfo->Entry, uint32(DEFAULT_MAX_CREATURE_LEVEL));
636  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->MaxLevel = uint32(DEFAULT_MAX_CREATURE_LEVEL);
637  }
638 
639  if (cInfo->Expansion > MAX_EXPANSION)
640  {
641  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) `Expansion(%u)` is not correct", cInfo->Entry, uint32(MAX_EXPANSION));
642  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->Expansion = -1;
643  }
644 
645  if (!cInfo->UnitClass || (((1 << (cInfo->UnitClass - 1)) & CLASSMASK_ALL_CREATURES) == 0))
646  {
647  ERROR_DB_STRICT_LOG("Creature (Entry: %u) does not have proper `UnitClass` (%u) in creature_template", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->UnitClass);
648  // Mark NPC as having improper data by his expansion
649  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->Expansion = -1;
650  }
651 
652  if (!sLog.HasLogFilter(LOG_FILTER_DB_STRICTED_CHECK) && cInfo->Expansion >= 0) // TODO - Remove the DB_STRICTED_CHECK after a while
653  {
654  // check if ClassLevel data are available for all possible level of that creature
655  for (uint32 level = cInfo->MinLevel; level <= cInfo->MaxLevel; ++level)
656  {
657  if (!GetCreatureClassLvlStats(level, cInfo->UnitClass, cInfo->Expansion))
658  {
659  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u), level(%u) has no data in `creature_template_classlevelstats`", cInfo->Entry, level);
660  // Deactivate using ClassLevelStats for this NPC
661  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->Expansion = -1;
662  }
663  }
664  }
665 
666  if (cInfo->DamageSchool >= MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL)
667  {
668  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has invalid spell school value (%u) in `DamageSchool`", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->DamageSchool);
669  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->DamageSchool = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL;
670  }
671 
672  if (cInfo->MeleeBaseAttackTime == 0)
673  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->MeleeBaseAttackTime = BASE_ATTACK_TIME;
674 
675  if (cInfo->RangedBaseAttackTime == 0)
676  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->RangedBaseAttackTime = BASE_ATTACK_TIME;
677 
678  if (cInfo->NpcFlags & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK)
679  {
680  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has dynamic flag UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK (%u) set, it expect to be set by code base at `npc_spellclick_spells` content.", cInfo->Entry, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK);
681  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->NpcFlags &= ~UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK;
682  }
683 
684  if ((cInfo->NpcFlags & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER) && cInfo->TrainerType >= MAX_TRAINER_TYPE)
685  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has wrong `TrainerType(%u)`", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->TrainerType);
686 
687  if (cInfo->CreatureType && !sCreatureTypeStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->CreatureType))
688  {
689  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has invalid `CreatureType(%u)`", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->CreatureType);
690  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->CreatureType = CREATURE_TYPE_HUMANOID;
691  }
692 
693  // must exist or used hidden but used in data horse case
694  if (cInfo->Family && !sCreatureFamilyStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->Family) && cInfo->Family != CREATURE_FAMILY_HORSE_CUSTOM)
695  {
696  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has invalid creature family (%u) in `Family`", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->Family);
697  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->Family = 0;
698  }
699 
700  if (cInfo->InhabitType <= 0 || cInfo->InhabitType > INHABIT_ANYWHERE)
701  {
702  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has wrong value (%u) in `InhabitType`, creature will not correctly walk/swim/fly", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->InhabitType);
703  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->InhabitType = INHABIT_ANYWHERE;
704  }
705 
706  if (cInfo->PetSpellDataId)
707  {
708  CreatureSpellDataEntry const* spellDataId = sCreatureSpellDataStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->PetSpellDataId);
709  if (!spellDataId)
710  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has non-existing `PetSpellDataId(%u)`", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->PetSpellDataId);
711  }
712 
713  if (cInfo->MovementType >= MAX_DB_MOTION_TYPE)
714  {
715  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has wrong movement generator type (%u) set in `MovementType`, ignore and set to IDLE.", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->MovementType);
716  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->MovementType = IDLE_MOTION_TYPE;
717  }
718 
719  if (cInfo->VehicleTemplateId && !sVehicleStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->VehicleTemplateId))
720  {
721  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has non-existing `VehicleTemplateId(%u)`, set to 0.", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->VehicleTemplateId);
722  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->VehicleTemplateId = 0;
723  }
724 
725  if (cInfo->EquipmentTemplateId > 0) // 0 no equipment
726  {
727  if (!GetEquipmentInfo(cInfo->EquipmentTemplateId))
728  {
729  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_template` have creature (Entry: %u) with `EquipmentTemplateId(%u)` not found in table `creature_equip_template`, set to no equipment.", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->EquipmentTemplateId);
730  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->EquipmentTemplateId = 0;
731  }
732  }
733 
734  if (cInfo->VendorTemplateId > 0)
735  {
736  if (!(cInfo->NpcFlags & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR))
737  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_template` have creature (Entry: %u) with `VendorTemplateId(%u)` but not have flag UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR (%u), vendor items will ignored.", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->VendorTemplateId, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR);
738  }
739 
741  if (cInfo->Scale <= 0.0f)
742  {
743  if (displayScaleEntry)
744  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->Scale = displayScaleEntry->scale;
745  else
746  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->Scale = DEFAULT_OBJECT_SCALE;
747  }
748 
749  if (cInfo->StringID1 && !sScriptMgr.ExistsStringId(cInfo->StringID1))
750  {
751  sLog.outErrorDb("Table creature_template entry %u StringId1 %u does not exist. Setting to 0.", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->StringID1);
752  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->StringID1 = 0;
753  }
754 
755  if (cInfo->StringID2 && !sScriptMgr.ExistsStringId(cInfo->StringID2))
756  {
757  sLog.outErrorDb("Table creature_template entry %u StringID2 %u does not exist. Setting to 0.", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->StringID2);
758  const_cast<CreatureInfo*>(cInfo)->StringID2 = 0;
759  }
760  }
761 
762  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature definitions", sCreatureStorage.GetRecordCount());
763  sLog.outString();
764 }
765 
766 void ObjectMgr::ConvertCreatureAddonAuras(CreatureDataAddon* addon, char const* table, char const* guidEntryStr)
767 {
768  // Now add the auras, format "spell1 spell2 ..."
769  char* p;
770  std::vector<int> val;
771  char* s = p = (char*)reinterpret_cast<char const*>(addon->auras);
772  if (p)
773  {
774  while (p[0] != 0)
775  {
776  ++p;
777  if (p[0] == ' ')
778  {
779  val.push_back(atoi(s));
780  s = ++p;
781  }
782  }
783  if (p != s)
784  val.push_back(atoi(s));
785 
786  // free char* loaded memory
787  delete[](char*)reinterpret_cast<char const*>(addon->auras);
788  }
789 
790  // empty list
791  if (val.empty())
792  {
793  addon->auras = nullptr;
794  return;
795  }
796 
797  // replace by new structures array
798  const_cast<uint32*&>(addon->auras) = new uint32[val.size() + 1];
799 
800  uint32 i = 0;
801  for (int j : val)
802  {
803  uint32& cAura = const_cast<uint32&>(addon->auras[i]);
804  cAura = uint32(j);
805 
806  SpellEntry const* AdditionalSpellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(cAura);
807  if (!AdditionalSpellInfo)
808  {
809  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s: %u) has wrong spell %u defined in `auras` field in `%s`.", guidEntryStr, addon->guidOrEntry, cAura, table);
810  continue;
811  }
812 
813  // Must be Aura, but also allow dummy/script effect spells, as they are used sometimes to select a random aura or similar
814  if (!IsSpellAppliesAura(AdditionalSpellInfo) && !IsSpellHaveEffect(AdditionalSpellInfo, SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY) && !IsSpellHaveEffect(AdditionalSpellInfo, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT) && !IsSpellHaveEffect(AdditionalSpellInfo, SPELL_EFFECT_TRIGGER_SPELL))
815  {
816  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s: %u) has spell %u defined in `auras` field in `%s, but spell doesn't apply an aura`.", guidEntryStr, addon->guidOrEntry, cAura, table);
817  continue;
818  }
819 
820  if (SpellCastTimesEntry const* spellCastTimeEntry = sSpellCastTimesStore.LookupEntry(AdditionalSpellInfo->CastingTimeIndex))
821  {
822  if (spellCastTimeEntry->CastTime > 0)
823  {
824  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s: %u) has spell %u defined in `auras` field in `%s, but spell has cast time. Use it in AI instead.", guidEntryStr, addon->guidOrEntry, cAura, table);
825  continue;
826  }
827  }
828 
829  // TODO: Remove LogFilter check after more research
830  if (!sLog.HasLogFilter(LOG_FILTER_DB_STRICTED_CHECK) && !IsOnlySelfTargeting(AdditionalSpellInfo))
831  {
832  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s: %u) has spell %u defined in `auras` field in `%s, but spell is no self-only spell`.", guidEntryStr, addon->guidOrEntry, cAura, table);
833  continue;
834  }
835 
836  if (IsSpellHaveAura(AdditionalSpellInfo, SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE))
837  {
838  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s: %u) has spell %u defined in `auras` field in `%s, but vehicle control spells are not suitable for _addon.auras handling`.", guidEntryStr, addon->guidOrEntry, cAura, table);
839  continue;
840  }
841 
842  if (std::find(&addon->auras[0], &addon->auras[i], cAura) != &addon->auras[i])
843  {
844  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s: %u) has duplicate spell %u defined in `auras` field in `%s`.", guidEntryStr, addon->guidOrEntry, cAura, table);
845  continue;
846  }
847 
848  ++i;
849  }
850 
851  // fill terminator element (after last added)
852  const_cast<uint32&>(addon->auras[i]) = 0;
853 }
854 
855 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureAddons(SQLStorage& creatureaddons, char const* entryName, char const* comment)
856 {
857  creatureaddons.Load();
858 
859  // check data correctness and convert 'auras'
860  for (uint32 i = 1; i < creatureaddons.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
861  {
862  CreatureDataAddon const* addon = creatureaddons.LookupEntry<CreatureDataAddon>(i);
863  if (!addon)
864  continue;
865 
866  if (addon->mount)
867  {
868  if (!sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(addon->mount))
869  {
870  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s %u) have invalid displayInfoId for mount (%u) defined in `%s`.", entryName, addon->guidOrEntry, addon->mount, creatureaddons.GetTableName());
871  const_cast<CreatureDataAddon*>(addon)->mount = 0;
872  }
873  }
874 
875  if (addon->sheath_state > SHEATH_STATE_RANGED)
876  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s %u) has unknown sheath state (%u) defined in `%s`.", entryName, addon->guidOrEntry, addon->sheath_state, creatureaddons.GetTableName());
877 
878  if (!sEmotesStore.LookupEntry(addon->emote))
879  {
880  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (%s %u) have invalid emote (%u) defined in `%s`.", entryName, addon->guidOrEntry, addon->emote, creatureaddons.GetTableName());
881  const_cast<CreatureDataAddon*>(addon)->emote = 0;
882  }
883 
884  ConvertCreatureAddonAuras(const_cast<CreatureDataAddon*>(addon), creatureaddons.GetTableName(), entryName);
885  }
886 
887  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u %s", creatureaddons.GetRecordCount(), comment);
888 }
889 
890 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureAddons()
891 {
892  LoadCreatureAddons(sCreatureInfoAddonStorage, "Entry", "creature template addons");
893 
894  // check entry ids
895  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureInfoAddonStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
896  if (CreatureDataAddon const* addon = sCreatureInfoAddonStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureDataAddon>(i))
897  if (!sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(addon->guidOrEntry))
898  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) does not exist but has a record in `%s`", addon->guidOrEntry, sCreatureInfoAddonStorage.GetTableName());
899 
900  LoadCreatureAddons(sCreatureDataAddonStorage, "GUID", "creature addons");
901 
902  // check entry ids
903  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureDataAddonStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
904  if (CreatureDataAddon const* addon = sCreatureDataAddonStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureDataAddon>(i))
905  if (mCreatureDataMap.find(addon->guidOrEntry) == mCreatureDataMap.end())
906  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (GUID: %u) does not exist but has a record in `creature_addon`", addon->guidOrEntry);
907 }
908 
909 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureClassLvlStats()
910 {
911  // initialize data array
912  memset(&m_creatureClassLvlStats, 0, sizeof(m_creatureClassLvlStats));
913 
914  std::string queryStr = "SELECT Class, Level, BaseMana, BaseMeleeAttackPower, BaseRangedAttackPower, BaseArmor";
915 
916  std::string expData;
917  for (int i = 0; i <= MAX_EXPANSION; ++i)
918  {
919  std::ostringstream str;
920  str << ", BaseHealthExp" << i << ", BaseDamageExp" << i;
921  expData += str.str();
922  }
923 
924  queryStr += expData + " FROM creature_template_classlevelstats ORDER BY Class, Level";
925 
926  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query(queryStr.c_str());
927 
928  if (!result)
929  {
930  BarGoLink bar(1);
931  bar.step();
932  sLog.outErrorDb("DB table `creature_template_classlevelstats` is empty.");
933  sLog.outString();
934  return;
935  }
936 
937  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
938  uint32 storedRow = 0;
939 
940  do
941  {
942  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
943  bar.step();
944 
945  uint32 creatureClass = fields[0].GetUInt32();
946  uint32 creatureLevel = fields[1].GetUInt32();
947 
948  if (creatureLevel == 0 || creatureLevel > DEFAULT_MAX_CREATURE_LEVEL)
949  {
950  sLog.outErrorDb("Found stats for creature level [%u], incorrect level for this core. Skip!", creatureLevel);
951  continue;
952  }
953 
954  if (((1 << (creatureClass - 1)) & CLASSMASK_ALL_CREATURES) == 0)
955  {
956  sLog.outErrorDb("Found stats for creature class [%u], incorrect class for this core. Skip!", creatureClass);
957  continue;
958  }
959 
960  uint32 baseMana = fields[2].GetUInt32();
961  float baseMeleeAttackPower = fields[3].GetFloat();
962  float baseRangedAttackPower = fields[4].GetFloat();
963  uint32 baseArmor = fields[5].GetUInt32();
964 
965  for (int i = 0; i <= MAX_EXPANSION; ++i)
966  {
967  CreatureClassLvlStats& cCLS = m_creatureClassLvlStats[creatureLevel][classToIndex[creatureClass]][i];
968 
969  cCLS.BaseMana = baseMana;
970  cCLS.BaseMeleeAttackPower = baseMeleeAttackPower;
971  cCLS.BaseRangedAttackPower = baseRangedAttackPower;
972  cCLS.BaseArmor = baseArmor;
973 
974  cCLS.BaseHealth = fields[6 + (i * 2)].GetUInt32();
975  cCLS.BaseDamage = fields[7 + (i * 2)].GetFloat();
976  }
977  ++storedRow;
978  }
979  while (result->NextRow());
980 
981  delete result;
982 
983  sLog.outString(">> Found %u creature stats definitions.", storedRow);
984  sLog.outString();
985 }
986 
987 CreatureClassLvlStats const* ObjectMgr::GetCreatureClassLvlStats(uint32 level, uint32 unitClass, int32 expansion) const
988 {
989  if (expansion < 0)
990  return nullptr;
991 
992  CreatureClassLvlStats const* cCLS = &m_creatureClassLvlStats[level][classToIndex[unitClass]][expansion];
993 
994  if (cCLS->BaseHealth != 0 && cCLS->BaseDamage > 0.1f)
995  return cCLS;
996 
997  return nullptr;
998 }
999 
1000 std::vector<std::pair<TypeID, uint32>> const& ObjectMgr::GetDbGuidsForTransport(uint32 mapId) const
1001 {
1002  return (*m_guidsForMap.find(mapId)).second;
1003 }
1004 
1005 VehicleSeatParameters const* ObjectMgr::GetVehicleSeatParameters(uint32 seatEntry) const
1006 {
1007  auto itr = m_seatParameters.find(seatEntry);
1008  if (itr == m_seatParameters.end())
1009  return nullptr;
1010 
1011  return &itr->second;
1012 }
1013 
1014 CreatureImmunityVector const* ObjectMgr::GetCreatureImmunitySet(uint32 entry, uint32 setId) const
1015 {
1016  auto itr = m_creatureImmunities.find(entry);
1017  if (itr == m_creatureImmunities.end())
1018  return nullptr;
1019 
1020  auto& setIds = (*itr).second;
1021  auto setItr = setIds.find(setId);
1022  if (setItr == setIds.end())
1023  return nullptr;
1024 
1025  return &(*setItr).second;
1026 }
1027 
1028 CreatureSpellList* ObjectMgr::GetCreatureSpellList(uint32 Id) const
1029 {
1030  auto itr = m_spellListContainer->spellLists.find(Id);
1031  if (itr == m_spellListContainer->spellLists.end())
1032  return nullptr;
1033 
1034  return &(*itr).second;
1035 }
1036 
1037 bool ObjectMgr::HasWorldStateName(int32 Id) const
1038 {
1039  return m_worldStateNames.find(Id) != m_worldStateNames.end();
1040 }
1041 
1042 WorldStateName* ObjectMgr::GetWorldStateName(int32 Id)
1043 {
1044  auto itr = m_worldStateNames.find(Id);
1045  if (itr == m_worldStateNames.end())
1046  return nullptr;
1047 
1048  return &(itr->second);
1049 }
1050 
1051 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureImmunities()
1052 {
1053  uint32 count = 0;
1054  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Entry, SetId, Type, Value FROM creature_immunities");
1055 
1056  if (result)
1057  {
1058  do
1059  {
1060  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1061 
1062  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1063  if (!sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(entry))
1064  {
1065  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureImmunities: Entry %u does not exist.", entry);
1066  continue;
1067  }
1068  uint32 setId = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1069  uint32 type = fields[2].GetUInt32();
1070  if (type >= MAX_SPELL_IMMUNITY)
1071  {
1072  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureImmunities: Invalid type %u.", type);
1073  continue;
1074  }
1075  uint32 value = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1076  m_creatureImmunities[entry][setId].push_back({ type, value });
1077  ++count;
1078  } while (result->NextRow());
1079  }
1080  delete result;
1081 
1082  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature_immunities definitions", count);
1083  sLog.outString();
1084 }
1085 
1086 std::shared_ptr<CreatureSpellListContainer> ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureSpellLists()
1087 {
1088  std::shared_ptr<CreatureSpellListContainer> newContainer = std::make_shared<CreatureSpellListContainer>();
1089  uint32 count = 0;
1090 
1091  std::unique_ptr<QueryResult> result(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Id, Type, Param1, Param2, Param3, UnitCondition, Comments FROM creature_spell_targeting"));
1092  if (result)
1093  {
1094  do
1095  {
1096  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1097 
1098  CreatureSpellListTargeting target;
1099  target.Id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1100  target.Type = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1101 
1102  if (target.Type > SPELL_LIST_TARGETING_MAX)
1103  {
1104  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureSpellLists: Invalid creature_spell_targeting type %u. Skipping.", target.Type);
1105  continue;
1106  }
1107 
1108  target.Param1 = fields[2].GetUInt32();
1109  target.Param2 = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1110  target.Param3 = fields[4].GetUInt32();
1111  target.UnitCondition = fields[5].GetInt32();
1112  target.Comment = fields[6].GetCppString();
1113  newContainer->targeting[target.Id] = target;
1114  } while (result->NextRow());
1115  }
1116 
1117  result.reset(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Id, Name, ChanceSupportAction, ChanceRangedAttack FROM creature_spell_list_entry"));
1118  if (result)
1119  {
1120  do
1121  {
1122  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1123  CreatureSpellList list;
1124  list.Id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1125  list.Name = fields[1].GetCppString();
1126  if (list.Name.empty())
1127  {
1128  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureSpellLists: Invalid creature_spell_list_entry empty name.");
1129  continue;
1130  }
1131 
1132  list.ChanceSupportAction = fields[2].GetUInt32();
1133  list.ChanceRangedAttack = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1134  list.Disabled = false;
1135  newContainer->spellLists[list.Id] = list;
1136  } while (result->NextRow());
1137  }
1138 
1139  result.reset(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Id, Position, SpellId, Flags, CombatCondition, TargetId, ScriptId, Availability, Probability, InitialMin, InitialMax, RepeatMin, RepeatMax FROM creature_spell_list"));
1140  if (result)
1141  {
1142  do
1143  {
1144  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1145  CreatureSpellListSpell spell;
1146  spell.Id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1147  spell.Position = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1148  spell.SpellId = fields[2].GetUInt32();
1149  spell.Flags = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1150  spell.CombatCondition = fields[4].GetUInt32();
1151 
1152  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell.SpellId);
1153  if (!spellInfo && spell.SpellId != 2) // 2 is attack which is hardcoded in client
1154  {
1155  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureSpellLists: Invalid creature_spell_list %u spell %u does not exist. Skipping.", spell.Id, spell.SpellId);
1156  continue;
1157  }
1158 
1159  if (newContainer->spellLists[spell.Id].Spells.find(spell.SpellId) != newContainer->spellLists[spell.Id].Spells.end())
1160  {
1161  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureSpellLists: Invalid creature_spell_list %u contains duplicate position %u. Skipping.", spell.Id, spell.Position);
1162  continue;
1163  }
1164 
1165  uint32 targetId = fields[5].GetUInt32();
1166  auto itr = newContainer->targeting.find(targetId);
1167  if (itr == newContainer->targeting.end())
1168  {
1169  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureSpellLists: Invalid creature_spell_list %u target %u. Skipping.", spell.Id, targetId);
1170  continue;
1171  }
1172  spell.Target = &(*itr).second;
1173 
1174  spell.ScriptId = fields[6].GetUInt32();
1175  spell.Availability = fields[7].GetUInt32();
1176  spell.Probability = fields[8].GetUInt32();
1177  spell.InitialMin = fields[9].GetUInt32();
1178  spell.InitialMax = fields[10].GetUInt32();
1179  spell.RepeatMin = fields[11].GetUInt32();
1180  spell.RepeatMax = fields[12].GetUInt32();
1181  spell.DisabledForAI = !spellInfo || spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_NO_AUTOCAST_AI);
1182  newContainer->spellLists[spell.Id].Spells.emplace(spell.Position, spell);
1183  } while (result->NextRow());
1184  }
1185 
1186  m_spellListContainer = newContainer;
1187  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature_spell_list definitions", count);
1188  sLog.outString();
1189 
1190  return newContainer;
1191 }
1192 
1193 void ObjectMgr::LoadSpawnGroups()
1194 {
1195  std::shared_ptr<SpawnGroupEntryContainer> newContainer = std::make_shared<SpawnGroupEntryContainer>();
1196  uint32 count = 0;
1197 
1198  std::unique_ptr<QueryResult> result(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Id, Name, Type, MaxCount, WorldState, WorldStateExpression, Flags, StringId FROM spawn_group"));
1199  if (result)
1200  {
1201  do
1202  {
1203  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1204  SpawnGroupEntry entry;
1205  entry.Id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1206  entry.Name = fields[1].GetCppString();
1207  if (entry.Name.empty())
1208  {
1209  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group empty name. Skipping.");
1210  continue;
1211  }
1212 
1213  entry.Type = (SpawnGroupType)fields[2].GetUInt32();
1214 
1215  if (entry.Type > SPAWN_GROUP_GAMEOBJECT)
1216  {
1217  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group unknown type %u. Skipping.", entry.Type);
1218  continue;
1219  }
1220 
1221  entry.MaxCount = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1222  entry.WorldStateCondition = fields[4].GetInt32();
1223 
1224  if (entry.WorldStateCondition)
1225  {
1226  const ConditionEntry* condition = sConditionStorage.LookupEntry<ConditionEntry>(entry.WorldStateCondition);
1227  if (!condition) // condition does not exist for some reason
1228  {
1229  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group (%u) condition entry %u. Skipping.", entry.Id, entry.WorldStateCondition);
1230  continue;
1231  }
1232  }
1233 
1234  entry.WorldStateExpression = fields[5].GetInt32();
1235  if (entry.WorldStateExpression)
1236  {
1237  if (!m_worldStateExpressionMgr->Exists(entry.WorldStateExpression)) // invalid id
1238  {
1239  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group (%u) worldstate expression id %u. Skipping.", entry.Id, entry.WorldStateExpression);
1240  continue;
1241  }
1242  }
1243 
1244  entry.Flags = fields[6].GetUInt32();
1245  entry.StringId = fields[7].GetUInt32();
1246 
1247  if (entry.StringId && !sScriptMgr.ExistsStringId(entry.StringId))
1248  {
1249  sLog.outErrorDb("Table spawn_group entry %u stringId %u does not exist. Setting to 0.", entry.Id, entry.StringId);
1250  entry.StringId = 0;
1251  }
1252 
1253  entry.Active = false;
1254  entry.EnabledByDefault = true;
1255  entry.formationEntry = nullptr;
1256  entry.HasChancedSpawns = false;
1257  newContainer->spawnGroupMap.emplace(entry.Id, entry);
1258  } while (result->NextRow());
1259  }
1260 
1261  result.reset(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Id, FormationType, FormationSpread, FormationOptions, PathId, MovementType, Comment FROM spawn_group_formation"));
1262  if (result)
1263  {
1264  do
1265  {
1266  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1267 
1268  FormationEntrySPtr fEntry = std::make_shared<FormationEntry>();
1269  fEntry->GroupId = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1270  uint32 fType = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1271  fEntry->Spread = fields[2].GetFloat();
1272  fEntry->Options = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1273  fEntry->MovementIdOrWander = fields[4].GetUInt32();
1274  fEntry->MovementType = fields[5].GetUInt32();
1275  fEntry->Comment = fields[6].GetCppString();
1276 
1277  auto itr = newContainer->spawnGroupMap.find(fEntry->GroupId);
1278  if (itr == newContainer->spawnGroupMap.end())
1279  {
1280  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid group Id:%u found in `spawn_group_formation`. Skipping.", fEntry->GroupId);
1281  continue;
1282  }
1283 
1284  if (fType >= static_cast<uint32>(SPAWN_GROUP_FORMATION_TYPE_COUNT))
1285  {
1286  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid formation type in `spawn_group_formation` ID:%u. Skipping.", fEntry->GroupId);
1287  continue;
1288  }
1289 
1290  if (fEntry->MovementType >= static_cast<uint32>(MAX_DB_MOTION_TYPE))
1291  {
1292  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid movement type in `spawn_group_formation` ID:%u. Skipping.", fEntry->GroupId);
1293  continue;
1294  }
1295 
1296  //todo this check have to be done after loading movement_table (load movement before spawn_group)
1297 // if (fEntry->MovementID)
1298 // {
1299 // auto path = sWaypointMgr.GetPathFromOrigin(fEntry->MovementID, 0, 0, WaypointPathOrigin::PATH_FROM_MOVEMENT_TEMPLATE);
1300 // if (!path)
1301 // {
1302 // sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: No path ID(%u) found for formation ID(%u) in `movement_template` ID:%u. Ignoring movement.", fEntry->MovementID, fEntry->GroupId);
1303 // fEntry->MovementID = 0;
1304 // }
1305 // }
1306 
1307  fEntry->Type = static_cast<SpawnGroupFormationType>(fType);
1308 
1309  if (fEntry->Spread > 15.0f || fEntry->Spread < -15)
1310  {
1311  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spread value (%5.2f) should be between (-15..15) in formation ID:%u . Skipping.", fEntry->Spread, fEntry->GroupId);
1312  continue;
1313  }
1314 
1315  itr->second.formationEntry = std::move(fEntry);
1316  } while (result->NextRow());
1317  }
1318 
1319  result.reset(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Id, Guid, SlotId, Chance FROM spawn_group_spawn"));
1320  if (result)
1321  {
1322  do
1323  {
1324  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1325 
1326  SpawnGroupDbGuids guid;
1327  guid.Id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1328  guid.DbGuid = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1329  guid.SlotId = fields[2].GetInt32();
1330  guid.Chance = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1331  guid.OwnEntry = 0;
1332  guid.RandomEntry = false;
1333 
1334  if (newContainer->spawnGroupMap.find(guid.Id) == newContainer->spawnGroupMap.end())
1335  {
1336  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group_spawn Id %u. Skipping.", guid.Id);
1337  continue;
1338  }
1339 
1340  auto& group = newContainer->spawnGroupMap[guid.Id];
1341 
1342  if (group.Type == SPAWN_GROUP_CREATURE)
1343  {
1344  CreatureData const* data = GetCreatureData(guid.DbGuid);
1345  if (!data)
1346  {
1347  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group_spawn guid %u. Skipping.", guid.DbGuid);
1348  continue;
1349  }
1350  if (!data->IsNotPartOfPoolOrEvent())
1351  {
1352  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: spawn_group_spawn guid %u is part of pool or game event (incompatible). Skipping.", guid.DbGuid);
1353  continue;
1354  }
1355  }
1356  else
1357  {
1358  GameObjectData const* data = GetGOData(guid.DbGuid);
1359  if (!data)
1360  {
1361  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group_spawn guid %u. Skipping.", guid.DbGuid);
1362  continue;
1363  }
1364  if (!data->IsNotPartOfPoolOrEvent())
1365  {
1366  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: spawn_group_spawn guid %u is part of pool or game event (incompatible). Skipping.", guid.DbGuid);
1367  continue;
1368  }
1369  }
1370 
1371  group.DbGuids.push_back(guid);
1372  if (guid.Chance)
1373  group.HasChancedSpawns = true;
1374  } while (result->NextRow());
1375 
1376  // check and fix correctness of slot id indexation
1377  for (auto& sg : newContainer->spawnGroupMap)
1378  {
1379  if (sg.second.formationEntry == nullptr)
1380  continue;
1381 
1382  auto& guidMap = sg.second.DbGuids;
1383 
1384  uint32 slotIndex = 0;
1385  bool dbError = false;
1386  std::sort(guidMap.begin(), guidMap.end(), [](SpawnGroupDbGuids const& a, SpawnGroupDbGuids const& b) { return a.SlotId < b.SlotId; });
1387  for (auto& gInfo : guidMap)
1388  {
1389  if (gInfo.SlotId < 0)
1390  continue;
1391 
1392  if (gInfo.SlotId != slotIndex)
1393  {
1394  gInfo.SlotId = slotIndex;
1395  dbError = true;
1396  }
1397  ++slotIndex;
1398  }
1399 
1400  if (dbError)
1401  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid index for slot id in `spawn_group_spawn` for group ID:%u. Using default.", sg.second.Id);
1402  }
1403  }
1404 
1405  result.reset(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Id, Entry, MinCount, MaxCount, Chance FROM spawn_group_entry"));
1406  if (result)
1407  {
1408  do
1409  {
1410  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1411  SpawnGroupRandomEntry randomEntry;
1412  randomEntry.Id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1413  randomEntry.Entry = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1414  randomEntry.MinCount = fields[2].GetUInt32();
1415  randomEntry.MaxCount = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1416  randomEntry.Chance = fields[4].GetUInt32();
1417 
1418  auto itr = newContainer->spawnGroupMap.find(randomEntry.Id);
1419  if (itr == newContainer->spawnGroupMap.end())
1420  {
1421  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group_entry Id %u. Skipping.", randomEntry.Id);
1422  continue;
1423  }
1424 
1425  if ((*itr).second.Type == SPAWN_GROUP_CREATURE)
1426  {
1427  if (!GetCreatureTemplate(randomEntry.Entry))
1428  {
1429  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group_entry Creature entry %u. Skipping.", randomEntry.Entry);
1430  continue;
1431  }
1432  }
1433  else if ((*itr).second.Type == SPAWN_GROUP_GAMEOBJECT)
1434  {
1435  if (!GetGameObjectInfo(randomEntry.Entry))
1436  {
1437  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group_entry GameObject %u. Skipping.", randomEntry.Id);
1438  continue;
1439  }
1440  }
1441  else // safety for future extension
1442  continue;
1443 
1444  newContainer->spawnGroupMap[randomEntry.Id].RandomEntries.push_back(randomEntry);
1445  } while (result->NextRow());
1446  }
1447 
1448  result.reset(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Id, LinkedId FROM spawn_group_linked_group"));
1449  if (result)
1450  {
1451  do
1452  {
1453  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1454 
1455  uint32 Id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1456  uint32 linkedId = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1457 
1458  if (newContainer->spawnGroupMap.find(Id) == newContainer->spawnGroupMap.end())
1459  {
1460  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group_linked_group Id %u. Skipping.", Id);
1461  continue;
1462  }
1463 
1464  if (newContainer->spawnGroupMap.find(linkedId) == newContainer->spawnGroupMap.end())
1465  {
1466  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadSpawnGroups: Invalid spawn_group_linked_group LinkedId %u. Skipping.", linkedId);
1467  continue;
1468  }
1469 
1470  auto& group = newContainer->spawnGroupMap[Id];
1471 
1472  group.LinkedGroups.push_back(linkedId);
1473  } while (result->NextRow());
1474  }
1475 
1476  for (auto& data : newContainer->spawnGroupMap)
1477  {
1478  SpawnGroupEntry& entry = data.second;
1479  if (entry.MaxCount == 0) // if no explicit max count, the max count is min of count of all random entries or spawns
1480  {
1481  uint32 maxRandom = 0;
1482  bool maxCount = false;
1483  for (auto& randomEntry : entry.RandomEntries)
1484  {
1485  maxRandom += randomEntry.MaxCount;
1486  if (randomEntry.Chance == 0)
1487  maxCount = true;
1488  }
1489  if (maxCount)
1490  entry.MaxCount = entry.DbGuids.size();
1491  else
1492  entry.MaxCount = std::min(maxRandom, uint32(entry.DbGuids.size()));
1493  if (!entry.MaxCount && entry.RandomEntries.empty())
1494  entry.MaxCount = entry.DbGuids.size();
1495  }
1496 
1497  for (auto& randomEntry : entry.RandomEntries)
1498  {
1499  if (randomEntry.Chance == 0)
1500  entry.EquallyChanced.push_back(&randomEntry);
1501  else
1502  entry.ExplicitlyChanced.push_back(&randomEntry);
1503  }
1504 
1505  for (auto& guidData : entry.DbGuids)
1506  {
1507  if (entry.Type == SPAWN_GROUP_CREATURE)
1508  {
1509  CreatureData const* data = GetCreatureData(guidData.DbGuid);
1510  RemoveCreatureFromGrid(guidData.DbGuid, data);
1511  newContainer->spawnGroupByGuidMap.emplace(std::make_pair(guidData.DbGuid, uint32(TYPEID_UNIT)), &entry);
1512  if (sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_AUTOLOAD_ACTIVE))
1513  {
1514  for (auto& data : entry.RandomEntries)
1515  {
1516  if (CreatureInfo const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate(data.Entry))
1517  {
1518  if ((cinfo->ExtraFlags & CREATURE_EXTRA_FLAG_ACTIVE) != 0)
1519  {
1520  entry.Active = true;
1521  break;
1522  }
1523  }
1524  }
1525  }
1526  if (data->spawnMask == 0)
1527  entry.EnabledByDefault = false;
1528  if (data->id)
1529  guidData.OwnEntry = data->id;
1530  if (GetAllRandomCreatureEntries(guidData.DbGuid))
1531  guidData.RandomEntry = true;
1532  }
1533  else
1534  {
1535  GameObjectData const* data = GetGOData(guidData.DbGuid);
1536  RemoveGameobjectFromGrid(guidData.DbGuid, data);
1537  newContainer->spawnGroupByGuidMap.emplace(std::make_pair(guidData.DbGuid, uint32(TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)), &entry);
1538  if (sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_AUTOLOAD_ACTIVE))
1539  {
1540  for (auto& data : entry.RandomEntries)
1541  {
1542  if (CreatureInfo const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate(data.Entry))
1543  {
1544  if ((cinfo->ExtraFlags & CREATURE_EXTRA_FLAG_ACTIVE) != 0)
1545  {
1546  entry.Active = true;
1547  break;
1548  }
1549  }
1550  }
1551  }
1552  if (data->spawnMask == 0)
1553  entry.EnabledByDefault = false;
1554  if (data->id)
1555  guidData.OwnEntry = data->id;
1556  if (GetAllRandomGameObjectEntries(guidData.DbGuid))
1557  guidData.RandomEntry = true;
1558  }
1559  }
1560  }
1561 
1562  m_spawnGroupContainer = newContainer;
1563  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u spawn_group definitions", uint32(m_spawnGroupContainer->spawnGroupMap.size()));
1564  sLog.outString();
1565 }
1566 
1567 void ObjectMgr::LoadEquipmentTemplates()
1568 {
1569  sEquipmentStorage.Load();
1570 
1571  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sEquipmentStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
1572  {
1573  EquipmentInfo const* eqInfo = sEquipmentStorage.LookupEntry<EquipmentInfo>(i);
1574 
1575  if (!eqInfo)
1576  continue;
1577 
1578  for (uint8 j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
1579  {
1580  if (!eqInfo->equipentry[j])
1581  continue;
1582 
1583  ItemEntry const* dbcitem = sItemStore.LookupEntry(eqInfo->equipentry[j]);
1584  if (!dbcitem)
1585  {
1586  sLog.outErrorDb("Unknown item (entry=%u) in creature_equip_template.equipentry%u for entry = %u, forced to 0.", eqInfo->equipentry[j], j + 1, i);
1587  const_cast<EquipmentInfo*>(eqInfo)->equipentry[j] = 0;
1588  continue;
1589  }
1590 
1591  if (dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_WEAPON &&
1592  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_SHIELD &&
1593  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_RANGED &&
1594  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_2HWEAPON &&
1595  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_WEAPONMAINHAND &&
1596  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_WEAPONOFFHAND &&
1597  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_HOLDABLE &&
1598  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_THROWN &&
1599  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_RANGEDRIGHT &&
1600  dbcitem->InventoryType != INVTYPE_RELIC)
1601  {
1602  sLog.outErrorDb("Item (entry=%u) in creature_equip_template.equipentry%u for entry = %u is not equipable in a hand, forced to 0.", eqInfo->equipentry[j], j + 1, i);
1603  const_cast<EquipmentInfo*>(eqInfo)->equipentry[j] = 0;
1604  }
1605  }
1606  }
1607 
1608  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u equipment template", sEquipmentStorage.GetRecordCount());
1609  sLog.outString();
1610 }
1611 
1612 // generally models that does not have a gender(2), or has alternative model for same gender
1613 uint32 ObjectMgr::GetCreatureModelAlternativeModel(uint32 modelId) const
1614 {
1615  if (const CreatureModelInfo* modelInfo = GetCreatureModelInfo(modelId))
1616  return modelInfo->modelid_alternative;
1617 
1618  return 0;
1619 }
1620 
1621 CreatureModelInfo const* ObjectMgr::GetCreatureModelRandomGender(uint32 display_id) const
1622 {
1623  CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = GetCreatureModelInfo(display_id);
1624  if (!minfo)
1625  return nullptr;
1626 
1627  // If a model for another gender exists, 50% chance to use it
1628  if (minfo->modelid_other_gender != 0 && urand(0, 1) == 0)
1629  {
1630  CreatureModelInfo const* minfo_tmp = GetCreatureModelInfo(minfo->modelid_other_gender);
1631  if (!minfo_tmp)
1632  {
1633  sLog.outErrorDb("Model (Entry: %u) has modelid_other_gender %u not found in table `creature_model_info`. ", minfo->modelid, minfo->modelid_other_gender);
1634  return minfo; // not fatal, just use the previous one
1635  }
1636  return minfo_tmp;
1637  }
1638  return minfo;
1639 }
1640 
1641 uint32 ObjectMgr::GetModelForRace(uint32 sourceModelId, uint32 racemask)
1642 {
1643  uint32 modelId = sourceModelId;
1644 
1645  CreatureModelRaceMapBounds bounds = m_mCreatureModelRaceMap.equal_range(sourceModelId);
1646 
1647  for (CreatureModelRaceMap::const_iterator itr = bounds.first; itr != bounds.second; ++itr)
1648  {
1649  if (!(itr->second.racemask & racemask))
1650  continue;
1651 
1652  if (itr->second.creature_entry)
1653  {
1654  const CreatureInfo* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate(itr->second.creature_entry);
1655  modelId = Creature::ChooseDisplayId(cInfo);
1656  }
1657  else
1658  {
1659  modelId = itr->second.modelid_racial;
1660  }
1661  }
1662 
1663  return modelId;
1664 }
1665 
1666 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureModelInfo()
1667 {
1668  sCreatureModelStorage.Load();
1669 
1670  // post processing
1671  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureModelStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
1672  {
1673  CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sCreatureModelStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureModelInfo>(i);
1674  if (!minfo)
1675  continue;
1676 
1677  if (!sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(minfo->modelid))
1678  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` has model for nonexistent model id (%u).", minfo->modelid);
1679 
1680  if (minfo->gender >= MAX_GENDER)
1681  {
1682  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` has invalid gender (%u) for model id (%u).", uint32(minfo->gender), minfo->modelid);
1683  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->gender = GENDER_MALE;
1684  }
1685 
1686  if (minfo->modelid_other_gender)
1687  {
1688  if (minfo->modelid_other_gender == minfo->modelid)
1689  {
1690  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` has redundant modelid_other_gender model (%u) defined for model id %u.", minfo->modelid_other_gender, minfo->modelid);
1691  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->modelid_other_gender = 0;
1692  }
1693  else if (!sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(minfo->modelid_other_gender))
1694  {
1695  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` has nonexistent modelid_other_gender model (%u) defined for model id %u.", minfo->modelid_other_gender, minfo->modelid);
1696  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->modelid_other_gender = 0;
1697  }
1698  }
1699 
1700  if (minfo->modelid_alternative)
1701  {
1702  if (minfo->modelid_alternative == minfo->modelid)
1703  {
1704  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` has redundant modelid_alternative model (%u) defined for model id %u.", minfo->modelid_alternative, minfo->modelid);
1705  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->modelid_alternative = 0;
1706  }
1707  else if (!sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(minfo->modelid_alternative))
1708  {
1709  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` has nonexistent modelid_alternative model (%u) defined for model id %u.", minfo->modelid_alternative, minfo->modelid);
1710  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->modelid_alternative = 0;
1711  }
1712  }
1713  }
1714 
1715  // character races expected have model info data in table
1716  for (uint32 race = 1; race < sChrRacesStore.GetNumRows(); ++race)
1717  {
1718  ChrRacesEntry const* raceEntry = sChrRacesStore.LookupEntry(race);
1719  if (!raceEntry)
1720  continue;
1721 
1722  if (!((1 << (race - 1)) & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
1723  continue;
1724 
1725  if (CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = GetCreatureModelInfo(raceEntry->model_f))
1726  {
1727  if (minfo->gender != GENDER_FEMALE)
1728  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` have wrong gender %u for character race %u female model id %u", minfo->gender, race, raceEntry->model_f);
1729 
1730  if (minfo->modelid_other_gender != raceEntry->model_m)
1731  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` have wrong other gender model id %u for character race %u female model id %u", minfo->modelid_other_gender, race, raceEntry->model_f);
1732 
1733  if (minfo->bounding_radius <= 0.0f)
1734  {
1735  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` have wrong bounding_radius %f for character race %u female model id %u, use %f instead", minfo->bounding_radius, race, raceEntry->model_f, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE);
1736  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->bounding_radius = DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE;
1737  }
1738 
1739  if (minfo->combat_reach != 1.5f)
1740  {
1741  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` have wrong combat_reach %f for character race %u female model id %u, expected always 1.5f", minfo->combat_reach, race, raceEntry->model_f);
1742  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->combat_reach = 1.5f;
1743  }
1744  }
1745  else
1746  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` expect have data for character race %u female model id %u", race, raceEntry->model_f);
1747 
1748  if (CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = GetCreatureModelInfo(raceEntry->model_m))
1749  {
1750  if (minfo->gender != GENDER_MALE)
1751  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` have wrong gender %u for character race %u male model id %u", minfo->gender, race, raceEntry->model_m);
1752 
1753  if (minfo->modelid_other_gender != raceEntry->model_f)
1754  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` have wrong other gender model id %u for character race %u male model id %u", minfo->modelid_other_gender, race, raceEntry->model_m);
1755 
1756  if (minfo->bounding_radius <= 0.0f)
1757  {
1758  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` have wrong bounding_radius %f for character race %u male model id %u, use %f instead", minfo->bounding_radius, race, raceEntry->model_f, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE);
1759  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->bounding_radius = DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE;
1760  }
1761 
1762  if (minfo->combat_reach != 1.5f)
1763  {
1764  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` have wrong combat_reach %f for character race %u male model id %u, expected always 1.5f", minfo->combat_reach, race, raceEntry->model_m);
1765  const_cast<CreatureModelInfo*>(minfo)->combat_reach = 1.5f;
1766  }
1767  }
1768  else
1769  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_info` expect have data for character race %u male model id %u", race, raceEntry->model_m);
1770  }
1771 
1772  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature model based info", sCreatureModelStorage.GetRecordCount());
1773  sLog.outString();
1774 }
1775 
1776 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureModelRace()
1777 {
1778  m_mCreatureModelRaceMap.clear(); // can be used for reload
1779 
1780  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT modelid, racemask, creature_entry, modelid_racial FROM creature_model_race");
1781 
1782  if (!result)
1783  {
1784  BarGoLink bar(1);
1785  bar.step();
1786  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded creature_model_race, table is empty!");
1787  sLog.outString();
1788  return;
1789  }
1790 
1791  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
1792 
1793  uint32 count = 0;
1794 
1795  // model, racemask
1796  std::map<uint32, uint32> model2raceMask;
1797 
1798  do
1799  {
1800  bar.step();
1801 
1802  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1803 
1804  CreatureModelRace raceData;
1805 
1806  raceData.modelid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1807  raceData.racemask = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1808  raceData.creature_entry = fields[2].GetUInt32();
1809  raceData.modelid_racial = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1810 
1811  if (!sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(raceData.modelid))
1812  {
1813  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` has model for nonexistent model id (%u), skipping", raceData.modelid);
1814  continue;
1815  }
1816 
1817  if (!sCreatureModelStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureModelInfo>(raceData.modelid))
1818  {
1819  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u does not exist in creature_model_info, skipping", raceData.modelid);
1820  continue;
1821  }
1822 
1823  if (!raceData.racemask)
1824  {
1825  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u has no racemask defined, skipping", raceData.modelid);
1826  continue;
1827  }
1828 
1829  if (!(raceData.racemask & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
1830  {
1831  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u include invalid racemask, skipping", raceData.modelid);
1832  continue;
1833  }
1834 
1835  std::map<uint32, uint32>::const_iterator model2Race = model2raceMask.find(raceData.modelid);
1836 
1837  // can't have same mask for same model several times
1838  if (model2Race != model2raceMask.end())
1839  {
1840  if (model2Race->second & raceData.racemask)
1841  {
1842  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u with racemask %u has mask already included for same modelid, skipping", raceData.modelid, raceData.racemask);
1843  continue;
1844  }
1845  }
1846 
1847  model2raceMask[raceData.modelid] |= raceData.racemask;
1848 
1849  // creature_entry is the prefered way
1850  if (raceData.creature_entry)
1851  {
1852  if (raceData.modelid_racial)
1853  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u has modelid_racial for modelid %u but a creature_entry are already defined, modelid_racial will never be used.", raceData.modelid, raceData.modelid_racial);
1854 
1855  if (!sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(raceData.creature_entry))
1856  {
1857  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u has creature_entry for nonexistent creature_template (%u), skipping", raceData.modelid, raceData.creature_entry);
1858  continue;
1859  }
1860  }
1861  else if (raceData.modelid_racial)
1862  {
1863  if (!sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(raceData.modelid_racial))
1864  {
1865  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u has modelid_racial for nonexistent model id (%u), skipping", raceData.modelid, raceData.modelid_racial);
1866  continue;
1867  }
1868 
1869  if (!sCreatureModelStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureModelInfo>(raceData.modelid_racial))
1870  {
1871  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u has modelid_racial %u, but are not defined in creature_model_info, skipping", raceData.modelid, raceData.modelid_racial);
1872  continue;
1873  }
1874  }
1875  else
1876  {
1877  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_model_race` modelid %u does not have either creature_entry or modelid_racial defined, skipping", raceData.modelid);
1878  continue;
1879  }
1880 
1881  m_mCreatureModelRaceMap.insert(CreatureModelRaceMap::value_type(raceData.modelid, raceData));
1882 
1883  ++count;
1884  }
1885  while (result->NextRow());
1886 
1887  delete result;
1888 
1889  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature_model_race entries", count);
1890  sLog.outString();
1891 }
1892 
1893 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureConditionalSpawn()
1894 {
1895  sCreatureConditionalSpawnStore.Load();
1896 
1897  // post processing
1898  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureConditionalSpawnStore.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
1899  {
1900  CreatureConditionalSpawn const* spawn = sCreatureConditionalSpawnStore.LookupEntry<CreatureConditionalSpawn>(i);
1901  if (!spawn)
1902  continue;
1903 
1904  CreatureInfo const* cInfoAlliance = GetCreatureTemplate(spawn->EntryAlliance);
1905  CreatureInfo const* cInfoHorde = GetCreatureTemplate(spawn->EntryHorde);
1906 
1907  // check if both alliance and horde entries are missing; one faction spawn is allowed
1908  if (!cInfoAlliance && !cInfoHorde)
1909  {
1910  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_conditional_spawn` has creature (GUID: %u) with non existing alliance creature entry %u and horde creature entry %u, skipped.", spawn->Guid, spawn->EntryAlliance, spawn->EntryHorde);
1911  }
1912  }
1913 
1914  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature_conditional_spawn entries", sCreatureConditionalSpawnStore.GetRecordCount());
1915  sLog.outString();
1916 }
1917 
1918 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureSpawnDataTemplates()
1919 {
1920  m_creatureSpawnTemplateMap.clear();
1921 
1922  std::unique_ptr<QueryResult> result(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Entry, NpcFlags, UnitFlags, Faction, ModelId, EquipmentId, CurHealth, CurMana, SpawnFlags, RelayId, StringId, Name FROM creature_spawn_data_template"));
1923  if (!result)
1924  {
1925  BarGoLink bar(1);
1926  bar.step();
1927  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded creature_spawn_data_template, table is empty!");
1928  sLog.outString();
1929  return;
1930  }
1931 
1932  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
1933 
1934  uint32 count = 0;
1935 
1936  do
1937  {
1938  bar.step();
1939 
1940  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1941 
1942  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1943  int32 npcFlags = int32(fields[1].GetUInt32());
1944  int64 unitFlags = int64(fields[2].GetUInt64());
1945  uint32 faction = fields[3].GetUInt32();
1946  uint32 modelId = fields[4].GetUInt32();
1947  int32 equipmentId = fields[5].GetInt32();
1948  uint32 curHealth = fields[6].GetUInt32();
1949  uint32 curMana = fields[7].GetUInt32();
1950  uint32 spawnFlags = fields[8].GetUInt32();
1951  uint32 relayId = fields[9].GetUInt32();
1952  uint32 stringId = fields[10].GetUInt32();
1953  std::string name = fields[11].GetCppString();
1954 
1955  if (name.empty())
1956  sLog.outErrorDb("Table creature_spawn_data_template for entry %u has empty name", entry);
1957 
1958  if (stringId && !sScriptMgr.ExistsStringId(stringId))
1959  {
1960  stringId = 0;
1961  sLog.outErrorDb("Table creature_spawn_data_template entry %u stringId %u does not exist. Setting to 0.", entry, stringId);
1962  }
1963 
1964  // leave room for invalidation in future
1965 
1966  auto& data = m_creatureSpawnTemplateMap[entry];
1967  data.npcFlags = npcFlags;
1968  data.unitFlags = unitFlags;
1969  data.faction = faction;
1970  data.modelId = modelId;
1971  data.equipmentId = equipmentId;
1972  data.curHealth = curHealth;
1973  data.curMana = curMana;
1974  data.spawnFlags = spawnFlags;
1975  data.relayId = relayId;
1976  data.stringId = stringId;
1977 
1978  ++count;
1979  }
1980  while (result->NextRow());
1981 
1982  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature_spawn_data_template entries", count);
1983  sLog.outString();
1984 }
1985 
1986 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureSpawnEntry()
1987 {
1988  m_creatureSpawnEntryMap.clear();
1989 
1990  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT guid, entry FROM creature_spawn_entry");
1991 
1992  if (!result)
1993  {
1994  BarGoLink bar(1);
1995  bar.step();
1996  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded creature_spawn_entry, table is empty!");
1997  sLog.outString();
1998  return;
1999  }
2000 
2001  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
2002 
2003  uint32 count = 0;
2004 
2005  do
2006  {
2007  bar.step();
2008 
2009  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2010 
2011  uint32 guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2012  uint32 entry = fields[1].GetUInt32();
2013 
2014  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate(entry);
2015  if (!cInfo)
2016  {
2017  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature_spawn_entry` has creature (GUID: %u) with non existing creature entry %u, skipped.", guid, entry);
2018  continue;
2019  }
2020 
2021  auto& entries = m_creatureSpawnEntryMap[guid];
2022  entries.push_back(entry);
2023 
2024  ++count;
2025  } while (result->NextRow());
2026 
2027  delete result;
2028 
2029  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature_spawn_entry entries", count);
2030  sLog.outString();
2031 }
2032 
2033 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatures()
2034 {
2035  uint32 count = 0;
2036  // 0 1 2
2037  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT creature.guid, creature.id, map,"
2038  // 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
2039  "position_x, position_y, position_z, orientation, spawntimesecsmin, spawntimesecsmax, spawndist,"
2040  // 10 11 12 13
2041  "MovementType, spawnMask, phaseMask, event,"
2042  // 14 15
2043  "pool_creature.pool_entry, pool_creature_template.pool_entry,"
2044  // 16
2045  "creature_spawn_data.id "
2046  "FROM creature "
2047  "LEFT OUTER JOIN game_event_creature ON creature.guid = game_event_creature.guid "
2048  "LEFT OUTER JOIN pool_creature ON creature.guid = pool_creature.guid "
2049  "LEFT OUTER JOIN pool_creature_template ON creature.id = pool_creature_template.id "
2050  "LEFT OUTER JOIN creature_spawn_data ON creature.guid = creature_spawn_data.guid ");
2051 
2052  if (!result)
2053  {
2054  BarGoLink bar(1);
2055  bar.step();
2056  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded 0 creature. DB table `creature` is empty.");
2057  sLog.outString();
2058  return;
2059  }
2060 
2061  // build single time for check creature data
2062  std::set<uint32> difficultyCreatures[MAX_DIFFICULTY - 1];
2063  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sCreatureStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
2064  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(i))
2065  for (uint32 diff = 0; diff < MAX_DIFFICULTY - 1; ++diff)
2066  if (cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff])
2067  difficultyCreatures[diff].insert(cInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff]);
2068 
2069  // build single time for check spawnmask
2070  std::map<uint32, uint32> spawnMasks;
2071  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sMapStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
2072  if (sMapStore.LookupEntry(i))
2073  for (int k = 0; k < MAX_DIFFICULTY; ++k)
2074  if (GetMapDifficultyData(i, Difficulty(k)))
2075  spawnMasks[i] |= (1 << k);
2076 
2077  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
2078 
2079  do
2080  {
2081  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2082  bar.step();
2083 
2084  uint32 guid = fields[ 0].GetUInt32();
2085  uint32 entry = fields[ 1].GetUInt32();
2086 
2087  // validate creature dual spawn template
2088  bool isConditional = false;
2089  if (entry == 0)
2090  {
2091  CreatureConditionalSpawn const* cSpawn = GetCreatureConditionalSpawn(guid);
2092  if (!cSpawn)
2093  {
2094  if (uint32 randomEntry = GetRandomCreatureEntry(guid))
2095  entry = randomEntry;
2096  }
2097  else
2098  {
2099  isConditional = true;
2100  // set a default entry to validate the record; will be reset back to 0 afterwards
2101  entry = cSpawn->EntryAlliance != 0 ? cSpawn->EntryAlliance : cSpawn->EntryHorde;
2102  }
2103  }
2104 
2105  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = nullptr;
2106  if (entry)
2107  {
2108  cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate(entry);
2109  if (!cInfo)
2110  {
2111  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` has creature (GUID: %u) with non existing creature entry %u, skipped.", guid, entry);
2112  continue;
2113  }
2114 
2115  if (!strcmp(cInfo->AIName, "TotemAI"))
2116  {
2117  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` has a creature (GUID: %u, entry: %u) using TotemAI via AIName, skipped.", guid, entry);
2118  continue;
2119  }
2120  }
2121 
2122  CreatureData& data = mCreatureDataMap[guid];
2123 
2124  data.id = entry;
2125  data.mapid = fields[ 2].GetUInt32();
2126  data.posX = fields[ 3].GetFloat();
2127  data.posY = fields[ 4].GetFloat();
2128  data.posZ = fields[ 5].GetFloat();
2129  data.orientation = fields[ 6].GetFloat();
2130  data.spawntimesecsmin = fields[ 7].GetUInt32();
2131  data.spawntimesecsmax = fields[ 8].GetUInt32();
2132  data.spawndist = fields[ 9].GetFloat();
2133  data.movementType = fields[10].GetUInt8();
2134  data.spawnMask = fields[11].GetUInt8();
2135  data.phaseMask = fields[12].GetUInt16();
2136  data.gameEvent = fields[13].GetInt16();
2137  data.GuidPoolId = fields[14].GetInt16();
2138  data.EntryPoolId = fields[15].GetInt16();
2139  data.spawnTemplate = GetCreatureSpawnTemplate(0);
2140  uint32 spawnDataEntry = fields[16].GetUInt32();
2141 
2142  MapEntry const* mapEntry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(data.mapid);
2143  if (!mapEntry)
2144  {
2145  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u) that spawned at nonexistent map (Id: %u), skipped.", guid, data.mapid);
2146  continue;
2147  }
2148 
2149  if (!MaNGOS::IsValidMapCoord(data.posX, data.posY, data.posZ))
2150  {
2151  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u) that spawned at not valid coordinate (x:%5.2f, y:%5.2f, z:%5.2f) skipped.", guid, data.posX, data.posY, data.posZ);
2152  continue;
2153  }
2154 
2155  if (data.spawntimesecsmax < data.spawntimesecsmin)
2156  {
2157  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u Entry: %u) with `spawntimesecsmax` (%u) value lower than `spawntimesecsmin` (%u), it will be adjusted to %u.",
2158  guid, data.id, uint32(data.spawntimesecsmax), uint32(data.spawntimesecsmin), uint32(data.spawntimesecsmin));
2159  data.spawntimesecsmax = data.spawntimesecsmin;
2160  }
2161 
2162  if (m_transportMaps.find(data.mapid) == m_transportMaps.end() && data.spawnMask & ~spawnMasks[data.mapid])
2163  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u) that have wrong spawn mask %u including not supported difficulty modes for map (Id: %u).", guid, data.spawnMask, data.mapid);
2164 
2165  bool ok = true;
2166  for (uint32 diff = 0; diff < MAX_DIFFICULTY - 1 && ok; ++diff)
2167  {
2168  if (difficultyCreatures[diff].find(data.id) != difficultyCreatures[diff].end())
2169  {
2170  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u) that listed as difficulty %u template (entry: %u) in `creature_template`, skipped.",
2171  guid, diff + 1, data.id);
2172  ok = false;
2173  }
2174  }
2175  if (!ok)
2176  continue;
2177 
2178  if (data.spawndist < 0.0f)
2179  {
2180  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u Entry: %u) with `spawndist`< 0, set to 0.", guid, data.id);
2181  data.spawndist = 0.0f;
2182  }
2183  else if (data.movementType == RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE)
2184  {
2185  if (data.spawndist == 0.0f)
2186  {
2187  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u Entry: %u) with `MovementType`=1 (random movement) but with `spawndist`=0, replace by idle movement type (0).", guid, data.id);
2188  data.movementType = IDLE_MOTION_TYPE;
2189  }
2190  }
2191  else if (data.movementType == IDLE_MOTION_TYPE)
2192  {
2193  if (data.spawndist != 0.0f)
2194  {
2195  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u Entry: %u) with `MovementType`=0 (idle) have `spawndist`<>0, set to 0.", guid, data.id);
2196  data.spawndist = 0.0f;
2197  }
2198  }
2199 
2200  if (data.phaseMask == 0)
2201  {
2202  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u Entry: %u) with `phaseMask`=0 (not visible for anyone), set to 1.", guid, data.id);
2203  data.phaseMask = 1;
2204  }
2205 
2206  if (spawnDataEntry > 0)
2207  {
2208  if (CreatureSpawnTemplate const* templateData = GetCreatureSpawnTemplate(spawnDataEntry))
2209  data.spawnTemplate = templateData;
2210  else
2211  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `creature` have creature (GUID: %u Entry: %u) with spawn template %u that doesnt exist.", guid, data.id, spawnDataEntry);
2212  }
2213 
2214  if (mapEntry->IsContinent())
2215  {
2216  auto terrainInfo = sTerrainMgr.LoadTerrain(data.mapid);
2217  data.OriginalZoneId = terrainInfo->GetZoneId(data.posX, data.posY, data.posZ);
2218  }
2219  else
2220  data.OriginalZoneId = 0;
2221 
2222  if (m_transportMaps.find(data.mapid) != m_transportMaps.end())
2223  m_guidsForMap[data.mapid].emplace_back(TYPEID_UNIT, guid);
2224  else if (data.IsNotPartOfPoolOrEvent()) // if not this is to be managed by GameEvent System or Pool system
2225  {
2226  AddCreatureToGrid(guid, &data);
2227 
2228  if (sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_AUTOLOAD_ACTIVE) && cInfo && cInfo->ExtraFlags & CREATURE_EXTRA_FLAG_ACTIVE)
2229  m_activeCreatures.emplace(data.mapid, guid);
2230  }
2231 
2232  // reset the entry to 0; this will be processed by Creature::GetCreatureConditionalSpawnEntry
2233  if (isConditional)
2234  data.id = 0;
2235 
2236  ++count;
2237  }
2238  while (result->NextRow());
2239 
2240  delete result;
2241 
2242  sLog.outString(">> Loaded " SIZEFMTD " creatures", mCreatureDataMap.size());
2243  sLog.outString();
2244 }
2245 
2246 void ObjectMgr::AddCreatureToGrid(uint32 guid, CreatureData const* data)
2247 {
2248  uint8 mask = data->spawnMask;
2249  for (uint8 i = 0; mask != 0; ++i, mask >>= 1)
2250  {
2251  if (mask & 1)
2252  {
2253  CellPair cell_pair = MaNGOS::ComputeCellPair(data->posX, data->posY);
2254  uint32 cell_id = (cell_pair.y_coord * TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_CELLS_PER_MAP) + cell_pair.x_coord;
2255 
2256  CellObjectGuids& cell_guids = mMapObjectGuids[MAKE_PAIR32(data->mapid, i)][cell_id];
2257  cell_guids.creatures.insert(guid);
2258  }
2259  }
2260 }
2261 
2262 void ObjectMgr::RemoveCreatureFromGrid(uint32 guid, CreatureData const* data)
2263 {
2264  uint8 mask = data->spawnMask;
2265  for (uint8 i = 0; mask != 0; ++i, mask >>= 1)
2266  {
2267  if (mask & 1)
2268  {
2269  CellPair cell_pair = MaNGOS::ComputeCellPair(data->posX, data->posY);
2270  uint32 cell_id = (cell_pair.y_coord * TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_CELLS_PER_MAP) + cell_pair.x_coord;
2271 
2272  CellObjectGuids& cell_guids = mMapObjectGuids[MAKE_PAIR32(data->mapid, i)][cell_id];
2273  cell_guids.creatures.erase(guid);
2274  }
2275  }
2276 }
2277 
2278 void ObjectMgr::LoadGameObjects()
2279 {
2280  uint32 count = 0;
2281 
2282  // 0 1 2 3 4 5 6
