9163  int idx = GetOrNewStorageLocaleIndexFor(LocaleConstant(i));
9164  if (idx >= 0)
9165  {
9166  // 0 -> default, idx in to idx+1
9167  if ((int32)data.Content.size() <= idx + 1)
9168  data.Content.resize(idx + 2);
9169 
9170  data.Content[idx + 1] = str;
9171  }
9172  }
9173  }
9174 
9175  // Load additional string content if necessary
9176  if (extra_content)
9177  {
9178  data.SoundId = fields[10].GetUInt32();
9179  data.Type = fields[11].GetUInt32();
9180  data.LanguageId = Language(fields[12].GetUInt32());
9181  data.Emote = fields[13].GetUInt32();
9182  uint32 broadcastTextId = fields[14].GetUInt32();
9183 
9184  if (data.SoundId && !sSoundEntriesStore.LookupEntry(data.SoundId))
9185  {
9186  _DoStringError("Entry %i in table `%s` has soundId %u but sound does not exist.", entry, table, data.SoundId);
9187  data.SoundId = 0;
9188  }
9189 
9190  if (!GetLanguageDescByID(data.LanguageId))
9191  {
9192  _DoStringError("Entry %i in table `%s` using Language %u but Language does not exist.", entry, table, uint32(data.LanguageId));
9193  data.LanguageId = LANG_UNIVERSAL;
9194  }
9195 
9196  if (data.Type >= CHAT_TYPE_MAX)
9197  {
9198  _DoStringError("Entry %i in table `%s` has Type %u but this Chat Type does not exist.", entry, table, data.Type);
9199  data.Type = CHAT_TYPE_SAY;
9200  }
9201 
9202  if (data.Emote && !sEmotesStore.LookupEntry(data.Emote))
9203  {
9204  _DoStringError("Entry %i in table `%s` has Emote %u but emote does not exist.", entry, table, data.Emote);
9205  data.Emote = EMOTE_ONESHOT_NONE;
9206  }
9207 
9208  if (broadcastTextId)
9209  {
9210  if (BroadcastText const* bct = GetBroadcastText(broadcastTextId))
9211  data.broadcastText = bct;
9212  else
9213  _DoStringError("Entry %i in table `%s` has BroadcastTextID %u but broadcast_text does not exist.", entry, table, broadcastTextId);
9214  }
9215  }
9216  }
9217  while (result->NextRow());
9218 
9219  delete result;
9220 
9221  if (min_value == MIN_MANGOS_STRING_ID)
9222  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u MaNGOS strings from table %s", count, table);
9223  else
9224  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u %s templates from %s", count, extra_content ? "text" : "string", table);
9225  sLog.outString();
9226 
9227  m_loadedStringCount[min_value] = count;
9228 
9229  return true;
9230 }
9231 
9232 const char* ObjectMgr::GetMangosString(int32 entry, int locale_idx) const
9233 {
9234  // locale_idx==-1 -> default, locale_idx >= 0 in to idx+1
9235  // Content[0] always exist if exist MangosStringLocale
9236  if (MangosStringLocale const* msl = GetMangosStringLocale(entry))
9237  {
9238  if ((int32)msl->Content.size() > locale_idx + 1 && !msl->Content[locale_idx + 1].empty())
9239  return msl->Content[locale_idx + 1].c_str();
9240  return msl->Content[0].c_str();
9241  }
9242 
9243  _DoStringError("Entry %i not found but requested", entry);
9244 
9245  return "<error>";
9246 }
9247 
9248 void ObjectMgr::LoadFishingBaseSkillLevel()
9249 {
9250  mFishingBaseForArea.clear(); // for reload case
9251 
9252  uint32 count = 0;
9253  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT entry,skill FROM skill_fishing_base_level");
9254 
9255  if (!result)
9256  {
9257  BarGoLink bar(1);
9258  bar.step();
9259  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded `skill_fishing_base_level`, table is empty!");
9260  sLog.outString();
9261  return;
9262  }
9263 
9264  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
9265 
9266  do
9267  {
9268  bar.step();
9269 
9270  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
9271  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
9272  int32 skill = fields[1].GetInt32();
9273 
9274  AreaTableEntry const* fArea = GetAreaEntryByAreaID(entry);
9275  if (!fArea)
9276  {
9277  sLog.outErrorDb("AreaId %u defined in `skill_fishing_base_level` does not exist", entry);
9278  continue;
9279  }
9280 
9281  mFishingBaseForArea[entry] = skill;
9282  ++count;
9283  }
9284  while (result->NextRow());
9285 
9286  delete result;
9287 
9288  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u areas for fishing base skill level", count);
9289  sLog.outString();
9290 }
9291 
9292 // Check if a target meets condition conditionId
9293 bool ObjectMgr::IsConditionSatisfied(uint32 conditionId, WorldObject const* target, Map const* map, WorldObject const* source, ConditionSource conditionSourceType) const
9294 {
9295  if (ConditionEntry const* condition = sConditionStorage.LookupEntry<ConditionEntry>(conditionId))
9296  return condition->Meets(target, map, source, conditionSourceType);
9297 
9298  return false;
9299 }
9300 
9301 bool ObjectMgr::IsWorldStateExpressionSatisfied(int32 expressionId, Map const* map)
9302 {
9303  return m_worldStateExpressionMgr->Meets(map, expressionId);
9304 }
9305 
9306 bool ObjectMgr::IsUnitConditionSatisfied(int32 conditionId, Unit const* source, Unit const* target)
9307 {
9308  return m_unitConditionMgr->Meets(source, target, conditionId);
9309 }
9310 
9311 bool ObjectMgr::IsCombatConditionSatisfied(int32 conditionId, Unit const* source, float range)
9312 {
9313  return m_combatConditionMgr->Meets(source, conditionId, range);
9314 }
9315 
9316 bool ObjectMgr::CheckDeclinedNames(const std::wstring& mainpart, DeclinedName const& names)
9317 {
9318  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_DECLINED_NAME_CASES; ++i)
9319  {
9320  std::wstring wname;
9321  if (!Utf8toWStr(names.name[i], wname))
9322  return false;
9323 
9324  if (mainpart != GetMainPartOfName(wname, i + 1))
9325  return false;
9326  }
9327  return true;
9328 }
9329 
9330 SkillRangeType GetSkillRangeType(SkillLineEntry const* pSkill, bool racial)
9331 {
9332  switch (pSkill->categoryId)
9333  {
9334  case SKILL_CATEGORY_LANGUAGES: return SKILL_RANGE_LANGUAGE;
9335  case SKILL_CATEGORY_WEAPON:
9336  {
9337  if (pSkill->id != SKILL_FIST_WEAPONS)
9338  return SKILL_RANGE_LEVEL;
9339  return SKILL_RANGE_MONO;
9340  }
9341  case SKILL_CATEGORY_ARMOR:
9342  case SKILL_CATEGORY_CLASS:
9343  {
9344  if (pSkill->id != SKILL_LOCKPICKING)
9345  return SKILL_RANGE_MONO;
9346  return SKILL_RANGE_LEVEL;
9347  }
9348  case SKILL_CATEGORY_SECONDARY:
9349  case SKILL_CATEGORY_PROFESSION:
9350  // not set skills for professions and racial abilities
9351  {
9352  // not set skills for professions and racial abilities
9353  if (IsProfessionOrRidingSkill(pSkill->id))
9354  return SKILL_RANGE_RANK;
9355  if (racial)
9356  return SKILL_RANGE_NONE;
9357  return SKILL_RANGE_MONO;
9358  }
9359  default:
9360  case SKILL_CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTES: // not found in dbc
9361  case SKILL_CATEGORY_GENERIC: // only GENERIC(DND)
9362  return SKILL_RANGE_NONE;
9363  }
9364 }
9365 
9366 void ObjectMgr::LoadGameTele()
9367 {
9368  m_GameTeleMap.clear(); // for reload case
9369 
9370  uint32 count = 0;
9371  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT id, position_x, position_y, position_z, orientation, map, name FROM game_tele");
9372 
9373  if (!result)
9374  {
9375  BarGoLink bar(1);
9376  bar.step();
9377  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded `game_tele`, table is empty!");
9378  sLog.outString();
9379  return;
9380  }
9381 
9382  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
9383 
9384  do
9385  {
9386  bar.step();
9387 
9388  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
9389 
9390  uint32 id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
9391 
9392  GameTele gt;
9393 
9394  gt.position_x = fields[1].GetFloat();
9395  gt.position_y = fields[2].GetFloat();
9396  gt.position_z = fields[3].GetFloat();
9397  gt.orientation = fields[4].GetFloat();
9398  gt.mapId = fields[5].GetUInt32();
9399  gt.name = fields[6].GetCppString();
9400 
9401  if (!MapManager::IsValidMapCoord(gt.mapId, gt.position_x, gt.position_y, gt.position_z, gt.orientation))
9402  {
9403  sLog.outErrorDb("Wrong position for id %u (name: %s) in `game_tele` table, ignoring.", id, gt.name.c_str());
9404  continue;
9405  }
9406 
9407  if (!Utf8toWStr(gt.name, gt.wnameLow))
9408  {
9409  sLog.outErrorDb("Wrong UTF8 name for id %u in `game_tele` table, ignoring.", id);
9410  continue;
9411  }
9412 
9413  wstrToLower(gt.wnameLow);
9414 
9415  m_GameTeleMap[id] = gt;
9416 
9417  ++count;
9418  }
9419  while (result->NextRow());
9420  delete result;
9421 
9422  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u GameTeleports", count);
9423  sLog.outString();
9424 }
9425 
9426 GameTele const* ObjectMgr::GetGameTele(const std::string& name) const
9427 {
9428  // explicit name case
9429  std::wstring wname;
9430  if (!Utf8toWStr(name, wname))
9431  return nullptr;
9432 
9433  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
9434  wstrToLower(wname);
9435 
9436  // Alternative first GameTele what contains wnameLow as substring in case no GameTele location found
9437  const GameTele* alt = nullptr;
9438  for (const auto& itr : m_GameTeleMap)
9439  {
9440  if (itr.second.wnameLow == wname)
9441  return &itr.second;
9442  if (alt == nullptr && itr.second.wnameLow.find(wname) != std::wstring::npos)
9443  alt = &itr.second;
9444  }
9445 
9446  return alt;
9447 }
9448 
9449 bool ObjectMgr::AddGameTele(GameTele& tele)
9450 {
9451  // find max id
9452  uint32 new_id = 0;
9453  for (GameTeleMap::const_iterator itr = m_GameTeleMap.begin(); itr != m_GameTeleMap.end(); ++itr)
9454  if (itr->first > new_id)
9455  new_id = itr->first;
9456 
9457  // use next
9458  ++new_id;
9459 
9460  if (!Utf8toWStr(tele.name, tele.wnameLow))
9461  return false;
9462 
9463  wstrToLower(tele.wnameLow);
9464 
9465  m_GameTeleMap[new_id] = tele;
9466  std::string safeName(tele.name);
9467  WorldDatabase.escape_string(safeName);
9468 
9469  return WorldDatabase.PExecuteLog("INSERT INTO game_tele "
9470  "(id,position_x,position_y,position_z,orientation,map,name) "
9471  "VALUES (%u,%f,%f,%f,%f,%u,'%s')",
9472  new_id, tele.position_x, tele.position_y, tele.position_z,
9473  tele.orientation, tele.mapId, safeName.c_str());
9474 }
9475 
9476 bool ObjectMgr::DeleteGameTele(const std::string& name)
9477 {
9478  // explicit name case
9479  std::wstring wname;
9480  if (!Utf8toWStr(name, wname))
9481  return false;
9482 
9483  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
9484  wstrToLower(wname);
9485 
9486  for (GameTeleMap::iterator itr = m_GameTeleMap.begin(); itr != m_GameTeleMap.end(); ++itr)
9487  {
9488  if (itr->second.wnameLow == wname)
9489  {
9490  WorldDatabase.PExecuteLog("DELETE FROM game_tele WHERE name = '%s'", itr->second.name.c_str());
9491  m_GameTeleMap.erase(itr);
9492  return true;
9493  }
9494  }
9495 
9496  return false;
9497 }
9498 
9499 void ObjectMgr::LoadMailLevelRewards()
9500 {
9501  m_mailLevelRewardMap.clear(); // for reload case
9502 
9503  uint32 count = 0;
9504  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT level, raceMask, mailTemplateId, senderEntry FROM mail_level_reward");
9505 
9506  if (!result)
9507  {
9508  BarGoLink bar(1);
9509  bar.step();
9510  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded `mail_level_reward`, table is empty!");
9511  sLog.outString();
9512  return;
9513  }
9514 
9515  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
9516 
9517  do
9518  {
9519  bar.step();
9520 
9521  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
9522 
9523  uint8 level = fields[0].GetUInt8();
9524  uint32 raceMask = fields[1].GetUInt32();
9525  uint32 mailTemplateId = fields[2].GetUInt32();
9526  uint32 senderEntry = fields[3].GetUInt32();
9527 
9528  if (level > MAX_LEVEL)
9529  {
9530  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `mail_level_reward` have data for level %u that more supported by client (%u), ignoring.", level, MAX_LEVEL);
9531  continue;
9532  }
9533 
9534  if (!(raceMask & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
9535  {
9536  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `mail_level_reward` have raceMask (%u) for level %u that not include any player races, ignoring.", raceMask, level);
9537  continue;
9538  }
9539 
9540  if (!sMailTemplateStore.LookupEntry(mailTemplateId))
9541  {
9542  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `mail_level_reward` have invalid mailTemplateId (%u) for level %u that invalid not include any player races, ignoring.", mailTemplateId, level);
9543  continue;
9544  }
9545 
9546  if (!GetCreatureTemplate(senderEntry))
9547  {
9548  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `mail_level_reward` have nonexistent sender creature entry (%u) for level %u that invalid not include any player races, ignoring.", senderEntry, level);
9549  continue;
9550  }
9551 
9552  m_mailLevelRewardMap[level].push_back(MailLevelReward(raceMask, mailTemplateId, senderEntry));
9553 
9554  ++count;
9555  }
9556  while (result->NextRow());
9557  delete result;
9558 
9559  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u level dependent mail rewards,", count);
9560  sLog.outString();
9561 }
9562 
9563 void ObjectMgr::LoadTrainers(char const* tableName, bool isTemplates)
9564 {
9565  CacheTrainerSpellMap& trainerList = isTemplates ? m_mCacheTrainerTemplateSpellMap : m_mCacheTrainerSpellMap;
9566 
9567  // For reload case
9568  for (auto& itr : trainerList)
9569  itr.second.Clear();
9570  trainerList.clear();
9571 
9572  std::set<uint32> skip_trainers;
9573 
9574  std::unique_ptr<QueryResult> result(WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT entry, spell,spellcost,reqskill,reqskillvalue,reqlevel,ReqAbility1,ReqAbility2,ReqAbility3,condition_id FROM %s", tableName));
9575 
9576  if (!result)
9577  {
9578  BarGoLink bar(1);
9579  bar.step();
9580  sLog.outString(">> Loaded `%s`, table is empty!", tableName);
9581  sLog.outString();
9582  return;
9583  }
9584 
9585  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
9586 
9587  std::set<uint32> talentIds;
9588 
9589  uint32 count = 0;
9590  do
9591  {
9592  bar.step();
9593 
9594  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
9595 
9596  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
9597  uint32 spell = fields[1].GetUInt32();
9598 
9599  SpellEntry const* spellinfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell);
9600  if (!spellinfo)
9601  {
9602  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` (Entry: %u ) has non existing spell %u, ignore", tableName, entry, spell);
9603  continue;
9604  }
9605 
9606  if (!SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellinfo))
9607  {
9608  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` (Entry: %u) has broken learning spell %u, ignore", tableName, entry, spell);
9609  continue;
9610  }
9611 
9612  if (GetTalentSpellCost(spell))
9613  {
9614  if (talentIds.find(spell) == talentIds.end())
9615  {
9616  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has talent as learning spell %u, ignore", tableName, spell);
9617  talentIds.insert(spell);
9618  }
9619  continue;
9620  }
9621 
9622  if (!isTemplates)
9623  {
9624  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate(entry);
9625 
9626  if (!cInfo)
9627  {
9628  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` have entry for nonexistent creature template (Entry: %u), ignore", tableName, entry);
9629  continue;
9630  }
9631 
9632  if (!(cInfo->NpcFlags & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER))
9633  {
9634  if (skip_trainers.find(entry) == skip_trainers.end())
9635  {
9636  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` have data for creature (Entry: %u) without trainer flag, ignore", tableName, entry);
9637  skip_trainers.insert(entry);
9638  }
9639  continue;
9640  }
9641 
9642  if (TrainerSpellData const* tSpells = cInfo->TrainerTemplateId ? GetNpcTrainerTemplateSpells(cInfo->TrainerTemplateId) : nullptr)
9643  {
9644  if (tSpells->spellList.find(spell) != tSpells->spellList.end())
9645  {
9646  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` (Entry: %u) has spell %u listed in trainer template %u, ignore", tableName, entry, spell, cInfo->TrainerTemplateId);
9647  continue;
9648  }
9649  }
9650  }
9651 
9652  TrainerSpellData& data = trainerList[entry];
9653 
9654  TrainerSpell& trainerSpell = data.spellList[spell];
9655  trainerSpell.spell = spell;
9656  trainerSpell.spellCost = fields[2].GetUInt32();
9657  trainerSpell.reqSkill = fields[3].GetUInt32();
9658  trainerSpell.reqSkillValue = fields[4].GetUInt32();
9659  trainerSpell.reqLevel = fields[5].GetUInt32();
9660  if (!fields[6].IsNULL())
9661  trainerSpell.reqAbility[0] = fields[6].GetUInt32();
9662  if (!fields[7].IsNULL())
9663  trainerSpell.reqAbility[1] = fields[7].GetUInt32();
9664  if (!fields[8].IsNULL())
9665  trainerSpell.reqAbility[2] = fields[8].GetUInt32();
9666  trainerSpell.conditionId = fields[9].GetUInt16();
9667 
9668  trainerSpell.isProvidedReqLevel = trainerSpell.reqLevel > 0;
9669 
9670  // By default, lets assume the specified spell is the one we want to teach the player...
9671  trainerSpell.learnedSpell = spell;
9672  // ...but first, lets inspect this spell...
9673  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
9674  {
9675  if (spellinfo->Effect[i] == SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL && spellinfo->EffectTriggerSpell[i])
9676  {
9677  switch (spellinfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i])
9678  {
9679  case TARGET_NONE:
9680  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER:
9681  // ...looks like the specified spell is actually a trainer's spell casted on a player to teach another spell
9682  // Trainer's spells can teach more than one spell (up to number of effects), but we will stick to the first one
9683  // Self-casts listed in trainer's lists usually come from recipes which were made trainable in a later patch
9684  trainerSpell.learnedSpell = spellinfo->EffectTriggerSpell[i];
9685  break;
9686  }
9687  }
9688  }
9689 
9690  // already checked as valid spell so exist.
9691  SpellEntry const* learnSpellinfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(trainerSpell.learnedSpell);
9692  if (SpellMgr::IsProfessionSpell(trainerSpell.learnedSpell))
9693  {
9694  data.trainerType = 2;
9695 
9696  uint32 minLevel = sSpellMgr.GetProfessionSpellMinLevel(trainerSpell.learnedSpell);
9697  if (trainerSpell.reqLevel)
9698  {
9699  if (minLevel == trainerSpell.reqLevel)
9700  ERROR_DB_STRICT_LOG("Table `%s` (Entry: %u) has redundant reqlevel %u (=prof reqlevel) for spell %u", tableName, entry, trainerSpell.reqLevel, spell);
9701  else
9702  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` (Entry: %u) has wrong redundant reqlevel %u (<>prof reqlevel %u) for spell %u", tableName, entry, trainerSpell.reqLevel, minLevel, spell);
9703  }
9704  else
9705  trainerSpell.reqLevel = minLevel;
9706  }
9707  // for non-prof. spell use spellLevel if not provided any
9708  else
9709  {
9710  if (trainerSpell.reqLevel)
9711  {
9712  if (trainerSpell.reqLevel == learnSpellinfo->spellLevel)
9713  ERROR_DB_STRICT_LOG("Table `%s` (Entry: %u) has redundant reqlevel %u (=spell level) for spell %u", tableName, entry, trainerSpell.reqLevel, spell);
9714  }
9715  else
9716  trainerSpell.reqLevel = learnSpellinfo->spellLevel;
9717  }
9718 
9719  if (trainerSpell.conditionId)
9720  {
9721  const ConditionEntry* condition = sConditionStorage.LookupEntry<ConditionEntry>(trainerSpell.conditionId);
9722  if (!condition) // condition does not exist for some reason
9723  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` (Entry: %u) has `condition_id` = %u but does not exist.", tableName, entry, trainerSpell.conditionId);
9724  }
9725 
9726  ++count;
9727  }
9728  while (result->NextRow());
9729 
9730  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %d trainer %sspells", count, isTemplates ? "template " : "");
9731  sLog.outString();
9732 }
9733 
9734 void ObjectMgr::LoadTrainerTemplates()
9735 {
9736  LoadTrainers("npc_trainer_template", true);
9737 
9738  // post loading check
9739  std::set<uint32> trainer_ids;
9740  bool hasErrored = false;
9741 
9742  for (CacheTrainerSpellMap::const_iterator tItr = m_mCacheTrainerTemplateSpellMap.begin(); tItr != m_mCacheTrainerTemplateSpellMap.end(); ++tItr)
9743  trainer_ids.insert(tItr->first);
9744 
9745  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
9746  {
9747  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(i))
9748  {
9749  if (cInfo->TrainerTemplateId)
9750  {
9751  if (m_mCacheTrainerTemplateSpellMap.find(cInfo->TrainerTemplateId) != m_mCacheTrainerTemplateSpellMap.end())
9752  trainer_ids.erase(cInfo->TrainerTemplateId);
9753  else
9754  {
9755  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has TrainerTemplateId = %u for nonexistent trainer template", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->TrainerTemplateId);
9756  hasErrored = true;
9757  }
9758  }
9759  }
9760  }
9761 
9762  for (uint32 trainer_id : trainer_ids)
9763  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `npc_trainer_template` has trainer template %u not used by any trainers ", trainer_id);
9764 
9765  if (hasErrored || !trainer_ids.empty()) // Append extra line in case of reported errors
9766  sLog.outString();
9767 }
9768 
9769 void ObjectMgr::LoadVendors(char const* tableName, bool isTemplates)
9770 {
9771  CacheVendorItemMap& vendorList = isTemplates ? m_mCacheVendorTemplateItemMap : m_mCacheVendorItemMap;
9772 
9773  // For reload case
9774  for (auto& itr : vendorList)
9775  itr.second.Clear();
9776  vendorList.clear();
9777 
9778  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT entry, item, maxcount, incrtime, ExtendedCost, condition_id FROM %s ORDER BY slot", tableName);
9779  if (!result)
9780  {
9781  BarGoLink bar(1);
9782 
9783  bar.step();
9784 
9785  sLog.outString(">> Loaded `%s`, table is empty!", tableName);
9786  sLog.outString();
9787  return;
9788  }
9789 
9790  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
9791 
9792  uint32 count = 0;
9793  do
9794  {
9795  bar.step();
9796  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
9797 
9798  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
9799  uint32 item_id = fields[1].GetUInt32();
9800  uint32 maxcount = fields[2].GetUInt32();
9801  uint32 incrtime = fields[3].GetUInt32();
9802  uint32 ExtendedCost = fields[4].GetUInt32();
9803  uint16 conditionId = fields[5].GetUInt16();
9804 
9805  if (!IsVendorItemValid(isTemplates, tableName, entry, item_id, maxcount, incrtime, ExtendedCost, conditionId, nullptr))
9806  continue;
9807 
9808  VendorItemData& vList = vendorList[entry];
9809 
9810  vList.AddItem(item_id, maxcount, incrtime, ExtendedCost, conditionId);
9811  ++count;
9812  }
9813  while (result->NextRow());
9814 
9815  delete result;
9816 
9817  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u vendor %sitems", count, isTemplates ? "template " : "");
9818  sLog.outString();
9819 }
9820 
9821 void ObjectMgr::LoadVendorTemplates()
9822 {
9823  LoadVendors("npc_vendor_template", true);
9824 
9825  // post loading check
9826  std::set<uint32> vendor_ids;
9827 
9828  for (CacheVendorItemMap::const_iterator vItr = m_mCacheVendorTemplateItemMap.begin(); vItr != m_mCacheVendorTemplateItemMap.end(); ++vItr)
9829  vendor_ids.insert(vItr->first);
9830 
9831  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
9832  {
9833  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(i))
9834  {
9835  if (cInfo->VendorTemplateId)
9836  {
9837  if (m_mCacheVendorTemplateItemMap.find(cInfo->VendorTemplateId) != m_mCacheVendorTemplateItemMap.end())
9838  vendor_ids.erase(cInfo->VendorTemplateId);
9839  else
9840  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has VendorTemplateId = %u for nonexistent vendor template", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->VendorTemplateId);
9841  }
9842  }
9843  }
9844 
9845  for (uint32 vendor_id : vendor_ids)
9846  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `npc_vendor_template` has vendor template %u not used by any vendors ", vendor_id);
9847 }
9848 
9849 /* This function is supposed to take care of three things:
9850  * 1) Load Transports on Map or on Continents
9851  * 2) Load Active Npcs on Map or Continents
9852  * 3) Load Everything dependend on config setting LoadAllGridsOnMaps
9853  *
9854  * This function is currently WIP, hence parts exist only as draft.
9855  */
9856 void ObjectMgr::LoadActiveEntities(Map* _map)
9857 {
9858  // Load active objects for _map
9859  if (sWorld.isForceLoadMap(_map->GetId()))
9860  {
9861  for (CreatureDataMap::const_iterator itr = mCreatureDataMap.begin(); itr != mCreatureDataMap.end(); ++itr)
9862  {
9863  if (itr->second.mapid == _map->GetId())
9864  _map->ForceLoadGrid(itr->second.posX, itr->second.posY);
9865  }
9866  }
9867  else // Normal case - Load all npcs that are active
9868  {
9869  auto bounds = m_activeCreatures.equal_range(_map->GetId());
9870  for (auto itr = bounds.first; itr != bounds.second; ++itr)
9871  {
9872  CreatureData const& data = mCreatureDataMap[itr->second];
9873  _map->ForceLoadGrid(data.posX, data.posY);
9874  }
9875 
9876  bounds = m_activeGameObjects.equal_range(_map->GetId());
9877  for (auto itr = bounds.first; itr != bounds.second; ++itr)
9878  {
9879  GameObjectData const& data = mGameObjectDataMap[itr->second];
9880  _map->ForceLoadGrid(data.posX, data.posY);
9881  }
9882  }
9883 
9884  // Load Transports on Map _map
9885 }
9886 
9887 void ObjectMgr::LoadNpcGossips()
9888 {
9889  m_mCacheNpcTextIdMap.clear();
9890 
9891  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT npc_guid, textid FROM npc_gossip");
9892  if (!result)
9893  {
9894  BarGoLink bar(1);
9895  bar.step();
9896  sLog.outString(">> Loaded `npc_gossip`, table is empty!");
9897  sLog.outString();
9898  return;
9899  }
9900 
9901  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
9902 
9903  uint32 count = 0;
9904  do
9905  {
9906  bar.step();
9907 
9908  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
9909 
9910  uint32 guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
9911  uint32 textid = fields[1].GetUInt32();
9912 
9913  if (!GetCreatureData(guid))
9914  {
9915  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `npc_gossip` have nonexistent creature (GUID: %u) entry, ignore. ", guid);
9916  continue;
9917  }
9918  if (!GetGossipText(textid))
9919  {
9920  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `npc_gossip` for creature (GUID: %u) have wrong Textid (%u), ignore. ", guid, textid);
9921  continue;
9922  }
9923 
9924  m_mCacheNpcTextIdMap[guid] = textid ;
9925  ++count;
9926  }
9927  while (result->NextRow());
9928 
9929  delete result;
9930 
9931  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %d NpcTextId", count);
9932  sLog.outString();
9933 }
9934 
9935 void ObjectMgr::LoadGossipMenu(std::set<uint32>& gossipScriptSet)
9936 {
9937  m_mGossipMenusMap.clear();
9938  // 0 1 2 3
9939  std::unique_ptr<QueryResult> result(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT entry, text_id, script_id, condition_id FROM gossip_menu"));
9940 
9941  if (!result)
9942  {
9943  BarGoLink bar(1);
9944  bar.step();
9945  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded gossip_menu, table is empty!");
9946  sLog.outString();
9947  return;
9948  }
9949 
9950  auto gossipScripts = sScriptMgr.GetScriptMap(SCRIPT_TYPE_GOSSIP);
9951 
9952  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
9953 
9954  uint32 count = 0;
9955 
9956  do
9957  {
9958  bar.step();
9959 
9960  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
9961 
9962  GossipMenus gMenu;
9963 
9964  gMenu.entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
9965  gMenu.text_id = fields[1].GetUInt32();
9966  gMenu.script_id = fields[2].GetUInt32();
9967 
9968  gMenu.conditionId = fields[3].GetUInt16();
9969 
9970  if (!GetGossipText(gMenu.text_id))
9971  {
9972  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu entry %u are using non-existing text_id %u", gMenu.entry, gMenu.text_id);
9973  continue;
9974  }
9975 
9976  // Check script-id
9977  if (gMenu.script_id)
9978  {
9979  if (gossipScripts->second.find(gMenu.script_id) == gossipScripts->second.end())
9980  {
9981  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu for menu %u, text-id %u have script_id %u that does not exist in `dbscripts_on_gossip`, ignoring", gMenu.entry, gMenu.text_id, gMenu.script_id);
9982  continue;
9983  }
9984 
9985  // Remove used script id
9986  gossipScriptSet.erase(gMenu.script_id);
9987  }
9988 
9989  if (gMenu.conditionId)
9990  {
9991  const ConditionEntry* condition = sConditionStorage.LookupEntry<ConditionEntry>(gMenu.conditionId);
9992  if (!condition)
9993  {
9994  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu for menu %u, text-id %u has condition_id %u that does not exist in `conditions`, ignoring", gMenu.entry, gMenu.text_id, gMenu.conditionId);
9995  gMenu.conditionId = 0;
9996  }
9997  }
9998 
9999  m_mGossipMenusMap.insert(GossipMenusMap::value_type(gMenu.entry, gMenu));
10000 
10001  ++count;
10002  }
10003  while (result->NextRow());
10004 
10005  // post loading tests
10006  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
10007  {
10008  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(i))
10009  if (cInfo->GossipMenuId)
10010  if (m_mGossipMenusMap.find(cInfo->GossipMenuId) == m_mGossipMenusMap.end())
10011  sLog.outErrorDb("Creature (Entry: %u) has GossipMenuId = %u for nonexistent menu", cInfo->Entry, cInfo->GossipMenuId);
10012  }
10013 
10014  if (!sLog.HasLogFilter(LOG_FILTER_DB_STRICTED_CHECK))
10015  {
10016  for (SQLStorageBase::SQLSIterator<GameObjectInfo> itr = sGOStorage.getDataBegin<GameObjectInfo>(); itr < sGOStorage.getDataEnd<GameObjectInfo>(); ++itr)
10017  if (uint32 menuid = itr->GetGossipMenuId())
10018  if (m_mGossipMenusMap.find(menuid) == m_mGossipMenusMap.end())
10019  sLog.outErrorDb("Gameobject (Entry: %u) has gossip_menu_id = %u for nonexistent menu", itr->id, menuid);
10020  }
10021 
10022  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u gossip_menu entries", count);
10023  sLog.outString();
10024 }
10025 
10026 void ObjectMgr::LoadGossipMenuItems(std::set<uint32>& gossipScriptSet)
10027 {
10028  m_mGossipMenuItemsMap.clear();
10029 
10030  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query(
10031  "SELECT menu_id, id, option_icon, option_text, option_broadcast_text, option_id, npc_option_npcflag, "
10032  "action_menu_id, action_poi_id, action_script_id, box_coded, box_money, box_text, box_broadcast_text, "
10033  "condition_id "
10034  "FROM gossip_menu_option ORDER BY menu_id, id");
10035 
10036  if (!result)
10037  {
10038  BarGoLink bar(1);
10039  bar.step();
10040  sLog.outErrorDb(">> Loaded gossip_menu_option, table is empty!");
10041  sLog.outString();
10042  return;
10043  }
10044 
10045  // prepare data for unused menu ids
10046  std::set<uint32> menu_ids; // for later integrity check
10047  if (!sLog.HasLogFilter(LOG_FILTER_DB_STRICTED_CHECK)) // check unused menu ids only in strict mode
10048  {
10049  for (GossipMenusMap::const_iterator itr = m_mGossipMenusMap.begin(); itr != m_mGossipMenusMap.end(); ++itr)
10050  if (itr->first)
10051  menu_ids.insert(itr->first);
10052 
10053  for (SQLStorageBase::SQLSIterator<GameObjectInfo> itr = sGOStorage.getDataBegin<GameObjectInfo>(); itr < sGOStorage.getDataEnd<GameObjectInfo>(); ++itr)
10054  if (uint32 menuid = itr->GetGossipMenuId())
10055  menu_ids.erase(menuid);
10056  }
10057 
10058  // loading
10059  BarGoLink bar(result->GetRowCount());
10060 
10061  uint32 count = 0;
10062 
10063  // prepare menuid -> CreatureInfo map for fast access
10064  typedef std::multimap<uint32, const CreatureInfo*> Menu2CInfoMap;
10065  Menu2CInfoMap menu2CInfoMap;
10066  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCreatureStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++i)
10067  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(i))
10068  if (cInfo->GossipMenuId)
10069  {
10070  menu2CInfoMap.insert(Menu2CInfoMap::value_type(cInfo->GossipMenuId, cInfo));
10071 
10072  // unused check data preparing part
10073  if (!sLog.HasLogFilter(LOG_FILTER_DB_STRICTED_CHECK))
10074  menu_ids.erase(cInfo->GossipMenuId);
10075  }
10076 
10077  auto gossipScripts = sScriptMgr.GetScriptMap(SCRIPT_TYPE_GOSSIP);
10078 
10079  do
10080  {
10081  bar.step();
10082 
10083  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
10084 
10085  GossipMenuItems gMenuItem;
10086 
10087  gMenuItem.menu_id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
10088  gMenuItem.id = fields[1].GetUInt32();
10089  gMenuItem.option_icon = fields[2].GetUInt8();
10090  gMenuItem.option_text = fields[3].GetCppString();
10091  gMenuItem.option_broadcast_text = fields[4].GetUInt32();
10092  gMenuItem.option_id = fields[5].GetUInt32();
10093  gMenuItem.npc_option_npcflag = fields[6].GetUInt32();
10094  gMenuItem.action_menu_id = fields[7].GetInt32();
10095  gMenuItem.action_poi_id = fields[8].GetUInt32();
10096  gMenuItem.action_script_id = fields[9].GetUInt32();
10097  gMenuItem.box_coded = fields[10].GetUInt8() != 0;
10098  gMenuItem.box_money = fields[11].GetUInt32();
10099  gMenuItem.box_text = fields[12].GetCppString();
10100  gMenuItem.box_broadcast_text = fields[13].GetUInt32();
10101  gMenuItem.conditionId = fields[14].GetUInt16();
10102 
10103  if (gMenuItem.menu_id) // == 0 id is special and not have menu_id data
10104  {
10105  if (m_mGossipMenusMap.find(gMenuItem.menu_id) == m_mGossipMenusMap.end())
10106  {
10107  sLog.outErrorDb("Gossip menu option (MenuId: %u) for nonexistent menu", gMenuItem.menu_id);
10108  continue;
10109  }
10110  }
10111 
10112  if (gMenuItem.action_menu_id > 0)
10113  {
10114  if (m_mGossipMenusMap.find(gMenuItem.action_menu_id) == m_mGossipMenusMap.end())
10115  sLog.outErrorDb("Gossip menu option (MenuId: %u Id: %u) have action_menu_id = %u for nonexistent menu", gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem.id, gMenuItem.action_menu_id);
10116  else if (!sLog.HasLogFilter(LOG_FILTER_DB_STRICTED_CHECK))
10117  menu_ids.erase(gMenuItem.action_menu_id);
10118  }
10119 
10120  if (gMenuItem.option_icon >= GOSSIP_ICON_MAX)
10121  {
10122  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu_option for menu %u, id %u has unknown icon id %u. Replacing with GOSSIP_ICON_CHAT", gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem.id, gMenuItem.option_icon);
10123  gMenuItem.option_icon = GOSSIP_ICON_CHAT;
10124  }
10125 
10126  if (gMenuItem.option_id == GOSSIP_OPTION_NONE)
10127  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu_option for menu %u, id %u use option id GOSSIP_OPTION_NONE. Option will never be used", gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem.id);
10128 
10129  if (gMenuItem.option_id >= GOSSIP_OPTION_MAX)
10130  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu_option for menu %u, id %u has unknown option id %u. Option will not be used", gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem.id, gMenuItem.option_id);
10131 
10132  if (gMenuItem.menu_id && gMenuItem.npc_option_npcflag)
10133  {
10134  bool found_menu_uses = false;
10135  bool found_flags_uses = false;
10136 
10137  std::pair<Menu2CInfoMap::const_iterator, Menu2CInfoMap::const_iterator> tm_bounds = menu2CInfoMap.equal_range(gMenuItem.menu_id);
10138  for (Menu2CInfoMap::const_iterator it2 = tm_bounds.first; !found_flags_uses && it2 != tm_bounds.second; ++it2)
10139  {
10140  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = it2->second;
10141 
10142  found_menu_uses = true;
10143 
10144  // some from creatures with gossip menu can use gossip option base at npc_flags
10145  if (gMenuItem.npc_option_npcflag & cInfo->NpcFlags)
10146  found_flags_uses = true;
10147  }
10148 
10149  if (found_menu_uses && !found_flags_uses)
10150  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu_option for menu %u, id %u has `npc_option_npcflag` = %u but creatures using this menu does not have corresponding `NpcFlags`. Option will not accessible in game.", gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem.id, gMenuItem.npc_option_npcflag);
10151  }
10152 
10153  if (gMenuItem.action_poi_id && !GetPointOfInterest(gMenuItem.action_poi_id))
10154  {
10155  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu_option for menu %u, id %u use non-existing action_poi_id %u, ignoring", gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem.id, gMenuItem.action_poi_id);
10156  gMenuItem.action_poi_id = 0;
10157  }
10158 
10159  if (gMenuItem.action_script_id)
10160  {
10161  if (gossipScripts->second.find(gMenuItem.action_script_id) == gossipScripts->second.end())
10162  {
10163  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu_option for menu %u, id %u have action_script_id %u that does not exist in `dbscripts_on_gossip`, ignoring", gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem.id, gMenuItem.action_script_id);
10164  continue;
10165  }
10166 
10167  // Remove used script id
10168  gossipScriptSet.erase(gMenuItem.action_script_id);
10169  }
10170 
10171  if (gMenuItem.conditionId)
10172  {
10173  const ConditionEntry* condition = sConditionStorage.LookupEntry<ConditionEntry>(gMenuItem.conditionId);
10174  if (!condition)
10175  {
10176  sLog.outErrorDb("Table gossip_menu_option for menu %u, id %u has condition_id %u that does not exist in `conditions`, ignoring", gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem.id, gMenuItem.conditionId);
10177  gMenuItem.conditionId = 0;
10178  }
10179  }
10180 
10181  m_mGossipMenuItemsMap.insert(GossipMenuItemsMap::value_type(gMenuItem.menu_id, gMenuItem));
10182 
10183  ++count;
10184  }
10185  while (result->NextRow());
10186 
10187  delete result;
10188 
10189  if (!sLog.HasLogFilter(LOG_FILTER_DB_STRICTED_CHECK))
10190  {
10191  for (uint32 menu_id : menu_ids)
10192  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `gossip_menu` contain unused (in creature or GO or menu options) menu id %u.", menu_id);
10193  }
10194 
10195  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u gossip_menu_option entries", count);
10196  sLog.outString();
10197 }
10198 
10199 void ObjectMgr::LoadGossipMenus()
10200 {
10201  auto gossipScripts = sScriptMgr.GetScriptMap(SCRIPT_TYPE_GOSSIP);
10202  // Check which script-ids in dbscripts_on_gossip are not used
10203  std::set<uint32> gossipScriptSet;
10204  for (auto itr = gossipScripts->second.begin(); itr != gossipScripts->second.end(); ++itr)
10205  gossipScriptSet.insert(itr->first);
10206 
10207  // Load gossip_menu and gossip_menu_option data
10208  sLog.outString("(Re)Loading Gossip menus...");
10209  LoadGossipMenu(gossipScriptSet);
10210  sLog.outString("(Re)Loading Gossip menu options...");
10211  LoadGossipMenuItems(gossipScriptSet);
10212 
10213  for (uint32 itr : gossipScriptSet)
10214  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `dbscripts_on_gossip` contains unused script, id %u.", itr);
10215 }
10216 
10217 void ObjectMgr::AddVendorItem(uint32 entry, uint32 item, uint32 maxcount, uint32 incrtime, uint32 extendedcost)
10218 {
10219  VendorItemData& vList = m_mCacheVendorItemMap[entry];
10220  vList.AddItem(item, maxcount, incrtime, extendedcost, 0);
10221 
10222  WorldDatabase.PExecuteLog("INSERT INTO npc_vendor (entry,item,maxcount,incrtime,extendedcost) VALUES('%u','%u','%u','%u','%u')", entry, item, maxcount, incrtime, extendedcost);
10223 }
10224 
10225 bool ObjectMgr::RemoveVendorItem(uint32 entry, uint32 item)
10226 {
10227  CacheVendorItemMap::iterator iter = m_mCacheVendorItemMap.find(entry);
10228  if (iter == m_mCacheVendorItemMap.end())
10229  return false;
10230 
10231  if (!iter->second.RemoveItem(item))
10232  return false;
10233 
10234  WorldDatabase.PExecuteLog("DELETE FROM npc_vendor WHERE entry='%u' AND item='%u'", entry, item);
10235  return true;
10236 }
10237 
10238 bool ObjectMgr::IsVendorItemValid(bool isTemplate, char const* tableName, uint32 vendor_entry, uint32 item_id, uint32 maxcount, uint32 incrtime, uint32 ExtendedCost, uint16 conditionId, Player* pl) const
10239 {
10240  char const* idStr = isTemplate ? "vendor template" : "vendor";
10241  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = nullptr;
10242 
10243  if (!isTemplate)
10244  {
10245  cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate(vendor_entry);
10246  if (!cInfo)
10247  {
10248  if (pl)
10249  ChatHandler(pl).SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_VENDORSELECTION);
10250  else
10251  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has data for nonexistent creature (Entry: %u), ignoring", tableName, vendor_entry);
10252  return false;
10253  }
10254  }
10255 
10256  if (!GetItemPrototype(item_id))
10257  {
10258  if (pl)
10259  ChatHandler(pl).PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, item_id);
10260  else
10261  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` for %s %u contain nonexistent item (%u), ignoring",
10262  tableName, idStr, vendor_entry, item_id);
10263  return false;
10264  }
10265 
10266  if (ExtendedCost && !sItemExtendedCostStore.LookupEntry(ExtendedCost))
10267  {
10268  if (pl)
10269  ChatHandler(pl).PSendSysMessage(LANG_EXTENDED_COST_NOT_EXIST, ExtendedCost);
10270  else
10271  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` contain item (Entry: %u) with wrong ExtendedCost (%u) for %s %u, ignoring",
10272  tableName, item_id, ExtendedCost, idStr, vendor_entry);
10273  return false;
10274  }
10275 
10276  if (maxcount > 0 && incrtime == 0)
10277  {
10278  if (pl)
10279  ChatHandler(pl).PSendSysMessage("MaxCount!=0 (%u) but IncrTime==0", maxcount);
10280  else
10281  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has `maxcount` (%u) for item %u of %s %u but `incrtime`=0, ignoring",
10282  tableName, maxcount, item_id, idStr, vendor_entry);
10283  return false;
10284  }
10285  if (maxcount == 0 && incrtime > 0)
10286  {
10287  if (pl)
10288  ChatHandler(pl).PSendSysMessage("MaxCount==0 but IncrTime<>=0");
10289  else
10290  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has `maxcount`=0 for item %u of %s %u but `incrtime`<>0, ignoring",
10291  tableName, item_id, idStr, vendor_entry);
10292  return false;
10293  }
10294 
10295  if (conditionId && !sConditionStorage.LookupEntry<ConditionEntry>(conditionId))
10296  {
10297  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has `condition_id`=%u for item %u of %s %u but this condition is not valid, ignoring", tableName, conditionId, item_id, idStr, vendor_entry);
10298  return false;
10299  }
10300 
10301  VendorItemData const* vItems = isTemplate ? GetNpcVendorTemplateItemList(vendor_entry) : GetNpcVendorItemList(vendor_entry);
10302  VendorItemData const* tItems = isTemplate ? nullptr : GetNpcVendorTemplateItemList(vendor_entry);
10303 
10304  if (!vItems && !tItems)
10305  return true; // later checks for non-empty lists
10306 
10307  if (vItems && vItems->FindItemCostPair(item_id, ExtendedCost))
10308  {
10309  if (pl)
10310  ChatHandler(pl).PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_ALREADY_IN_LIST, item_id, ExtendedCost);
10311  else
10312  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has duplicate items %u (with extended cost %u) for %s %u, ignoring",
10313  tableName, item_id, ExtendedCost, idStr, vendor_entry);
10314  return false;
10315  }
10316 
10317  if (!isTemplate)
10318  {
10319  if (tItems && tItems->FindItemCostPair(item_id, ExtendedCost))
10320  {
10321  if (pl)
10322  ChatHandler(pl).PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_ALREADY_IN_LIST, item_id, ExtendedCost);
10323  else
10324  {
10325  if (!cInfo->VendorTemplateId)
10326  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has duplicate items %u (with extended cost %u) for %s %u, ignoring",
10327  tableName, item_id, ExtendedCost, idStr, vendor_entry);
10328  else
10329  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has duplicate items %u (with extended cost %u) for %s %u (or possible in vendor template %u), ignoring",
10330  tableName, item_id, ExtendedCost, idStr, vendor_entry, cInfo->VendorTemplateId);
10331  }
10332  return false;
10333  }
10334  }
10335 
10336  uint32 countItems = vItems ? vItems->GetItemCount() : 0;
10337  countItems += tItems ? tItems->GetItemCount() : 0;
10338 
10339  if (countItems > std::numeric_limits<uint8>::max())
10340  {
10341  if (pl)
10342  ChatHandler(pl).SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ADDVENDORITEMITEMS);
10343  else
10344  sLog.outErrorDb("Table `%s` has too many items (%u > %i) for %s %u, ignoring",
10345  tableName, countItems, std::numeric_limits<uint8>::max(), idStr, vendor_entry);
10346  return false;
10347  }
10348 
10349  return true;
10350 }
10351 
10352 void ObjectMgr::AddGroup(Group* group)
10353 {
10354  mGroupMap[group->GetId()] = group ;
10355 }
10356 
10357 void ObjectMgr::RemoveGroup(Group* group)
10358 {
10359  mGroupMap.erase(group->GetId());
10360 }

10370 }
10371 
10372 void ObjectMgr::GetCreatureLocaleStrings(uint32 entry, int32 loc_idx, char const** namePtr, char const** subnamePtr) const
10373 {
10374  if (loc_idx >= 0)
10375  {
10376  if (CreatureLocale const* il = GetCreatureLocale(entry))
10377  {
10378  if (namePtr && il->Name.size() > size_t(loc_idx) && !il->Name[loc_idx].empty())
10379  *namePtr = il->Name[loc_idx].c_str();
10380 
10381  if (subnamePtr && il->SubName.size() > size_t(loc_idx) && !il->SubName[loc_idx].empty())
10382  *subnamePtr = il->SubName[loc_idx].c_str();
10383  }
10384  }
10385 }
10386 
10387 void ObjectMgr::GetItemLocaleStrings(uint32 entry, int32 loc_idx, std::string* namePtr, std::string* descriptionPtr) const
10388 {
10389  if (loc_idx >= 0)
10390  {
10391  if (ItemLocale const* il = GetItemLocale(entry))
10392  {
10393  if (namePtr && il->Name.size() > size_t(loc_idx) && !il->Name[loc_idx].empty())
10394  *namePtr = il->Name[loc_idx];
10395 
10396  if (descriptionPtr && il->Description.size() > size_t(loc_idx) && !il->Description[loc_idx].empty())
10397  *descriptionPtr = il->Description[loc_idx];
10398  }
10399  }
10400 }
10401 
10402 void ObjectMgr::GetQuestLocaleStrings(uint32 entry, int32 loc_idx, std::string* titlePtr) const
10403 {
10404  if (loc_idx >= 0)
10405  {
10406  if (QuestLocale const* il = GetQuestLocale(entry))
10407  {
10408  if (titlePtr && il->Title.size() > size_t(loc_idx) && !il->Title[loc_idx].empty())
10409  *titlePtr = il->Title[loc_idx];
10410  }
10411  }
10412 }
10413 
10414 void ObjectMgr::GetNpcTextLocaleStringsAll(uint32 entry, int32 loc_idx, ObjectMgr::NpcTextArray* text0_Ptr, ObjectMgr::NpcTextArray* text1_Ptr) const
10415 {
10416  if (loc_idx >= 0)
10417  {
10418  if (NpcTextLocale const* nl = GetNpcTextLocale(entry))
10419  {
10420  if (text0_Ptr)
10421  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_GOSSIP_TEXT_OPTIONS; ++i)
10422  if (nl->Text_0[i].size() > (size_t)loc_idx && !nl->Text_0[i][loc_idx].empty())
10423  (*text0_Ptr)[i] = nl->Text_0[i][loc_idx];
10424 
10425  if (text1_Ptr)
10426  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_GOSSIP_TEXT_OPTIONS; ++i)
10427  if (nl->Text_1[i].size() > (size_t)loc_idx && !nl->Text_1[i][loc_idx].empty())
10428  (*text1_Ptr)[i] = nl->Text_1[i][loc_idx];
10429  }
10430  }
10431 }
10432 
10433 void ObjectMgr::GetNpcTextLocaleStrings0(uint32 entry, int32 loc_idx, std::string* text0_0_Ptr, std::string* text1_0_Ptr) const

10437  if (NpcTextLocale const* nl = GetNpcTextLocale(entry))

10441  *text0_0_Ptr = nl->Text_0[0][loc_idx];
10442 
10443  if (text1_0_Ptr)
10444  if (nl->Text_1[0].size() > (size_t)loc_idx && !nl->Text_1[0][loc_idx].empty())
10445  *text1_0_Ptr = nl->Text_1[0][loc_idx];
10446  }

10481 
10482 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureTemplateSpells(std::shared_ptr<CreatureSpellListContainer> container)
10483 {
10484  uint32 count = 0;
10485  std::unique_ptr<QueryResult> result(WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT entry, setId, spell1, spell2, spell3, spell4, spell5, spell6, spell7, spell8, spell9, spell10 FROM creature_template_spells"));
10486 
10487  if (result)
10488  {
10489  do
10490  {
10491  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
10492 
10493  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
10494  uint32 setId = fields[1].GetUInt32();
10495 
10496  if (!sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(entry))
10497  {
10498  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureTemplateSpells: Spells found for creature entry %u, but creature does not exist, skipping", entry);
10499  continue;
10500  }
10501 
10502  auto& spellList = container->spellLists[entry * 100 + setId];
10503  spellList.Disabled = true;
10504  auto& spells = spellList.Spells;
10505 
10506  for (uint32 i = 0; i < CREATURE_MAX_SPELLS; ++i)
10507  {
10508  uint32 spellId = fields[2 + i].GetUInt32();
10509  if (!spellId)
10510  continue;
10511 
10512  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
10513  if (!spellInfo && spellId != 2) // 2 is attack which is hardcoded in client
10514  {
10515  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureTemplateSpells: Spells found for creature entry %u, assigned spell %u does not exist, set to 0", entry, spellId);
10516  continue;
10517  }
10518 
10519  CreatureSpellListSpell spell;
10520  spell.Id = entry * 100 + setId;
10521  spell.Position = i;
10522  spell.SpellId = spellId;
10523  spell.Flags = 0;
10524  spell.Target = &container->targeting[1];
10525  spell.InitialMin = 0;
10526  spell.InitialMax = 0;
10527 
10528  auto cooldown = GetCreatureCooldownRange(entry, spellId);
10529 
10530  spell.RepeatMin = cooldown.first;
10531  spell.RepeatMax = cooldown.second;
10532 
10533  spell.Availability = 100;
10534  spell.Probability = 0;
10535  spell.ScriptId = 0;
10536  spell.DisabledForAI = !spellInfo || spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_NO_AUTOCAST_AI);
10537  spells.emplace(i, spell);
10538  }
10539  } while (result->NextRow());
10540  }
10541 
10542  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature_cooldowns definitions", count);
10543  sLog.outString();
10544 }
10545 
10546 void ObjectMgr::LoadCreatureCooldowns()
10547 {
10548  // not deleting on reload because some cooldowns are SD2 based - instead we overwrite only
10549  uint32 count = 0;
10550  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Entry, SpellId, CooldownMin, CooldownMax FROM creature_cooldowns");
10551 
10552  if (result)
10553  {
10554  do
10555  {
10556  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
10557 
10558  uint32 entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
10559  if (!sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(entry))
10560  {
10561  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureCooldowns: Entry %u does not exist.", entry);
10562  continue;
10563  }
10564  uint32 spellId = fields[1].GetUInt32();
10565  if (!sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId))
10566  {
10567  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureCooldowns: SpellId %u does not exist.", spellId);
10568  continue;
10569  }
10570  uint32 cooldownMin = fields[2].GetUInt32();
10571  uint32 cooldownMax = fields[3].GetUInt32();
10572  if (cooldownMin == 0 && cooldownMax == 0)
10573  {
10574  sLog.outErrorDb("LoadCreatureCooldowns: Cooldowns are both 0 for entry %u spellId %u - redundant entry.", entry, spellId);
10575  continue;
10576  }
10577  m_creatureCooldownMap[entry][spellId] = std::make_pair(cooldownMin, cooldownMax);
10578  } while (result->NextRow());
10579  }
10580  delete result;
10581 
10582  sLog.outString(">> Loaded %u creature_cooldowns definitions", count);
10583  sLog.outString();
10584 }
10585 
10586 void ObjectMgr::AddCreatureCooldown(uint32 entry, uint32 spellId, uint32 min, uint32 max)
10587 {
10588  m_creatureCooldownMap[entry].emplace(spellId, std::make_pair(min, max));
10589 }

10593  return sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo>(entry);
10594 }

10602 {
10603  return sObjectMgr.GetMangosStringLocale(entry);
10604 }
10605 
10606 bool FindCreatureData::operator()(CreatureDataPair const& dataPair)
10607 {
10608  // skip wrong entry ids
10609  if (i_id && dataPair.second.id != i_id)
10610  return false;
10611 
10612  if (!i_anyData)
10613  i_anyData = &dataPair;
10614 
10615  // without player we can't find more stricted cases, so use fouded
10616  if (!i_player)
10617  return true;
10618 
10619  // skip diff. map cases
10620  if (dataPair.second.mapid != i_player->GetMapId())
10621  return false;
10622 
10623  float new_dist = i_player->GetDistance2d(dataPair.second.posX, dataPair.second.posY);
10624 
10625  if (!i_mapData || new_dist < i_mapDist)
10626  {
10627  i_mapData = &dataPair;
10628  i_mapDist = new_dist;
10629  }
10630 
10631  // skip not spawned (in any state),
10632  uint16 pool_id = sPoolMgr.IsPartOfAPool<Creature>(dataPair.first);
10633  if (pool_id && !i_player->GetMap()->GetPersistentState()->IsSpawnedPoolObject<Creature>(dataPair.first))
10634  return false;
10635 
10636  if (!i_spawnedData || new_dist < i_spawnedDist)
10637  {
10638  i_spawnedData = &dataPair;
10639  i_spawnedDist = new_dist;
10640  }
10641 
10642  return false;
10643 }
10644 
10645 CreatureDataPair const* FindCreatureData::GetResult() const
10646 {
10647  if (i_spawnedData)
10648  return i_spawnedData;
10649 
10650  if (i_mapData)
10651  return i_mapData;
10652 
10653  return i_anyData;
10654 }
10655 
10656 bool FindGOData::operator()(GameObjectDataPair const& dataPair)
10657 {
10658  // skip wrong entry ids
10659  if (i_id && dataPair.second.id != i_id)
10660  return false;
10661 
10662  if (!i_anyData)
10663  i_anyData = &dataPair;
10664 
10665  // without player we can't find more stricted cases, so use fouded
10666  if (!i_player)
10667  return true;
10668 
10669  // skip diff. map cases
10670  if (dataPair.second.mapid != i_player->GetMapId())
10671  return false;
10672 
10673  float new_dist = i_player->GetDistance2d(dataPair.second.posX, dataPair.second.posY);
10674 
10675  if (!i_mapData || new_dist < i_mapDist)
10676  {
10677  i_mapData = &dataPair;
10678  i_mapDist = new_dist;
10679  }
10680 
10681  // skip not spawned (in any state)
10682  uint16 pool_id = sPoolMgr.IsPartOfAPool<GameObject>(dataPair.first);
10683  if (pool_id && !i_player->GetMap()->GetPersistentState()->IsSpawnedPoolObject<GameObject>(dataPair.first))
10684  return false;
10685 
10686  if (!i_spawnedData || new_dist < i_spawnedDist)
10687  {
10688  i_spawnedData = &dataPair;
10689  i_spawnedDist = new_dist;
10690  }
10691 
10692  return false;
10693 }
10694 
10695 GameObjectDataPair const* FindGOData::GetResult() const
10696 {
10697  if (i_mapData)
10698  return i_mapData;
10699 
10700  if (i_spawnedData)
10701  return i_spawnedData;
10702 
10703  return i_anyData;
10704 }
10705 
10706 bool DoDisplayText(WorldObject* source, int32 entry, Unit const* target, uint32 chatTypeOverride)
10707 {
10708  uint32 sound, emote, type = 0;
10709  Language lang = LANG_UNIVERSAL;
10710  std::vector<std::string> content;
10711  Gender sourceGender = source->IsUnit() ? (Gender)((Unit*)source)->getGender() : GENDER_NONE;
10712 
10713  if (BroadcastText const* bct = sObjectMgr.GetBroadcastText(entry))
10714  {
10715  lang = bct->languageId;
10716  type = bct->chatTypeId;
10717  sound = bct->soundId1;
10718  emote = bct->emoteIds[0];
10719  content = bct->maleText;
10720 
10721  if ((sourceGender == GENDER_FEMALE || sourceGender == GENDER_NONE) && !bct->femaleText[DEFAULT_LOCALE].empty() && bct->femaleText.size() > 0)
10722  content = bct->femaleText;
10723 
10724  if (bct->maleText.size() > 0 && !bct->maleText[DEFAULT_LOCALE].empty())
10725  content = bct->maleText;
10726  }
10727  else if (MangosStringLocale const* data = sObjectMgr.GetMangosStringLocale(entry))
10728  {
10729  lang = data->LanguageId;
10730  type = data->Type;
10731  sound = data->SoundId;
10732  emote = data->Emote;
10733  if (BroadcastText const* bct = data->broadcastText)
10734  {
10735  if ((sourceGender == GENDER_FEMALE || sourceGender == GENDER_NONE) && !bct->femaleText[DEFAULT_LOCALE].empty() && bct->femaleText.size() > 0)
10736  content = bct->femaleText;
10737 
10738  if (bct->maleText.size() > 0 && !bct->maleText[DEFAULT_LOCALE].empty())
10739  content = bct->maleText;
10740  }
10741  else
10742  content = data->Content;
10743  }
10744 
10745  if (chatTypeOverride > 0)
10746  type = chatTypeOverride;
10747 
10748  if (content.empty())
10749  {
10750  _DoStringError("DoScriptText with source %s could not find text entry %i.", source->GetGuidStr().c_str(), entry);
10751  return false;
10752  }
10753 
10754  if (sound)
10755  {
10756  switch (type)
10757  {
10758  case CHAT_TYPE_ZONE_YELL:
10759  case CHAT_TYPE_ZONE_EMOTE:
10760  source->PlayDirectSound(sound, PlayPacketParameters(PLAY_ZONE, source->GetZoneId()));
10761  break;
10762  case CHAT_TYPE_WHISPER:
10763  case CHAT_TYPE_BOSS_WHISPER:
10764  // An error will be displayed for the text
10765  if (target && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
10766  source->PlayDirectSound(sound, PlayPacketParameters(PLAY_TARGET, (Player const*)target));
10767  break;
10768  default:
10769  source->PlayDirectSound(sound);
10770  break;
10771  }
10772  }
10773 
10774  if (emote)
10775  {
10776  if (source->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT || source->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
10777  {
10778  ((Unit*)source)->HandleEmote(emote);
10779  }
10780  else
10781  {
10782  _DoStringError("DoDisplayText entry %i tried to process emote for invalid source %s", entry, source->GetGuidStr().c_str());
10783  return false;
10784  }
10785  }
10786 
10787  if ((type == CHAT_TYPE_WHISPER || type == CHAT_TYPE_BOSS_WHISPER || type == CHAT_TYPE_PARTY) && (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER))
10788  {
10789  _DoStringError("DoDisplayText entry %i cannot whisper/party chat without target unit (TYPEID_PLAYER).", entry);
10790  return false;
10791  }
10792 
10793  source->MonsterText(content, type, lang, target);
10794  return true;
10795 }
